00124 //Set if there is an existing global summary.  The first time this is run on your computer, it
00125 //will not exist, and will have to be generated before this will be set.
00126 BOOLEAN gfGlobalSummaryExists;
00127 //If you don't wish to create a global summary, you can deny it.  This safely locks the system
00128 //from generating one.
00129 BOOLEAN gfDeniedSummaryCreation;
00130 //Set whenever the entire display is to be marked dirty.
00131 BOOLEAN gfRenderSummary;
00132 //Used externally to determine if the summary window is up or not.
00133 BOOLEAN gfSummaryWindowActive;
00134 //When set, the summary window stays up until told otherwise.  When clear, the summary will disappear
00135 //when the assigned key (F5) is released.  The latter mode is initiated when F5 is held down for longer
00136 //than .4 seconds, and is useful for quickly looking at the information in the current map being edited.
00137 BOOLEAN gfPersistantSummary;
00138 //When set, a grid is overlayed on top of the sector.  This grid defines each of the 256 sectors.  It is
00139 //on by default.
00140 BOOLEAN gfRenderGrid;
00141 //When set, parts of the map are darkened, showing that those sectors don't exist in the currently selected
00142 //layer.  When clear, the entire map is shown in full color.
00143 BOOLEAN gfRenderProgress;
00144 //When set, only the map section is rerendered.
00145 extern BOOLEAN gfRenderMap; // symbol already declared globally in AI Viewer.cpp (jonathanl)
00146 //Set whenever the ctrl key is held down.  This is used in conjunction with gfFileIO to determine whether the 
00147 //selected sector is to be saved instead of loaded when clear.
00148 BOOLEAN gfCtrlPressed;
00149 //When set, it is time to load or save the selected sector.  If gfCtrlPressed is set, the the map is saved, 
00150 //instead of loaded.  It is impossible to load a map that doesn't exist.
00151 BOOLEAN gfFileIO;
00152 //When set, then we are overriding the ability to use normal methods for selecting sectors for saving and 
00153 //loading.  Immediately upon entering the text input mode; for the temp file; then we are assuming that
00154 //the user will type in a name that doesn't follow standard naming conventions for the purposes of the 
00155 //campaign editor.  This is useful for naming a temp file for saving or loading.
00156 BOOLEAN gfTempFile;
00157 //When set, only the alternate version of the maps will be displayed.  This is used for alternate maps in 
00158 //particular sectors, such as the SkyRider quest which could be located at one of four maps randomly.  If
00159 //that particular map is chosen, then the alternate map will be used.
00160 BOOLEAN gfAlternateMaps = FALSE;

00188 //Override status.  Hide is when there is nothing to override, readonly, when checked is to override a
00189 //readonly status file, so that you can write to it, and overwrite, when checked, allows you to save,
00190 //replacing the existing file.  These states are not persistant, which forces the user to check the 
00191 //box before saving.
00192 enum{ INACTIVE, READONLY, OVERWRITE };
00193 UINT8 gubOverrideStatus;

00196 //The state of the override button, true if overriden intended.
00197 BOOLEAN gfOverride;

00258             return;

00387       AddTextInputField( MAP_LEFT+112, MAP_BOTTOM+75, 100, 18, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH, L"", 20, INPUTTYPE_EXCLUSIVE_DOSFILENAME );
00388       
00389       for( i = 1; i < NUM_SUMMARY_BUTTONS; i++ )
00390             HideButton( iSummaryButton[ i ] );
00391

00396       //if( gfItemDetailsMode )

00399       //    gfSetupItemDetailsMode = TRUE;
00400       //}
00401       if( !gfWorldLoaded )
00402       {
00403             gfConfirmExitFirst = FALSE;
00404             ReleaseSummaryWindow();
00405             DisableButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_OKAY ] );
00406             DisableButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_SAVE ] );
00407       }
00408       if( gfAutoLoadA9 )
00409       {
00410             gfAutoLoadA9++;
00411             gsSelSectorX = 9;
00412             gsSelSectorY = 1;
00413             gpCurrentSectorSummary = gpSectorSummary[ 8 ][ 0 ][ 0 ];
00414             ButtonList[ iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_LOAD ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00415       }
00416 }
00417 
00418 void AutoLoadMap()
00419 {
00420       SummaryLoadMapCallback( ButtonList[ iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_LOAD ] ], MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP );
00421       if( gfWorldLoaded )
00422             DestroySummaryWindow();
00423       gfAutoLoadA9 = FALSE;
00424       gfConfirmExitFirst = TRUE;
00425 }
00426 
00427 void ReleaseSummaryWindow()
00428 {
00429       INT32 i;
00430       UINT32 uiCurrTimer;
00431       if( !gfSummaryWindowActive || gfPersistantSummary )
00432             return;
00433       uiCurrTimer = GetJA2Clock();
00434       if( !gfWorldLoaded || uiCurrTimer - giInitTimer < 400 )
00435       { //make window persistant
00436             for( i = 1; i < NUM_SUMMARY_BUTTONS; i++ )
00437                   ShowButton( iSummaryButton[ i ] );
00438             HideButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_UPDATE ] );
00439             HideButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_OVERRIDE ] );
00440             HideButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_REAL ] );
00441             HideButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_SCIFI ] );
00442             HideButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_ENEMY ] );
00443             MSYS_EnableRegion( &MapRegion );
00444             gfPersistantSummary = TRUE;
00445             gfOverrideDirty = TRUE;
00446             gfRenderSummary = TRUE;
00447       }
00448       else
00449       {
00450             DestroySummaryWindow();
00451       }
00452 }
00453 
00454 void DestroySummaryWindow()
00455 {
00456       INT32 i;
00457       if( !gfSummaryWindowActive )
00458             return;
00459       for( i = 0; i < NUM_SUMMARY_BUTTONS; i++ )
00460       {
00461             RemoveButton( iSummaryButton[ i ] );
00462       }
00463 
00464       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &MapRegion );
00465 
00466       gfSummaryWindowActive = FALSE;
00467       gfPersistantSummary = FALSE;
00468       MarkWorldDirty();
00469       KillTextInputMode();
00470       EnableEditorTaskbar();
00471       EnableAllTextFields();
00472 
00473       if( gpWorldItemsSummaryArray )
00474       {
00475             MemFree( gpWorldItemsSummaryArray );
00476             gpWorldItemsSummaryArray = NULL;
00477             gusWorldItemsSummaryArraySize = 0;
00478       }
00479       if( gpPEnemyItemsSummaryArray )
00480       {
00481             MemFree( gpPEnemyItemsSummaryArray );
00482             gpPEnemyItemsSummaryArray = NULL;
00483             gusPEnemyItemsSummaryArraySize = 0;
00484       }
00485       if( gpNEnemyItemsSummaryArray )
00486       {
00487             MemFree( gpNEnemyItemsSummaryArray );
00488             gpNEnemyItemsSummaryArray = NULL;
00489             gusNEnemyItemsSummaryArraySize = 0;
00490       }
00491       if( gfWorldLoaded )
00492       {
00493             gfConfirmExitFirst = TRUE;
00494       }
00495 }
00496 
00497 void RenderSectorInformation()
00498 {
00499       //UINT16 str[ 100 ];
00500       MAPCREATE_STRUCT *m;
00501       SUMMARYFILE *s;
00502       UINT8 ePoints = 0;
00503       UINT16 usLine = 35;
00504       INT32 iOverall;
00505       
00506       SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
00507       SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
00508 
00509       s = gpCurrentSectorSummary;
00510       m = &gpCurrentSectorSummary->MapInfo;
00511 
00512       if( m->sNorthGridNo != -1 ) 
00513             ePoints++;
00514       if( m->sEastGridNo != -1 ) 
00515             ePoints++;
00516       if( m->sSouthGridNo != -1 ) 
00517             ePoints++;
00518       if( m->sWestGridNo != -1 ) 
00519             ePoints++;
00520       if( m->sCenterGridNo != -1 ) 
00521             ePoints++;
00522       if( m->sIsolatedGridNo != -1 ) 
00523             ePoints++;
00524       //start at 10,35
00525       SetFontForeground( FONT_ORANGE );
00526       mprintf( 10, 32,        L"Tileset:  %s", gTilesets[ s->ubTilesetID ].zName ); 
00527       if( m->ubMapVersion < 10 )
00528             SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
00529       mprintf( 10, 42,    L"Version Info:  Summary:  1.%02d,  Map:  %d.%02d", s->ubSummaryVersion, (INT32)s->dMajorMapVersion, m->ubMapVersion );
00530       SetFontForeground( FONT_GRAY2 );
00531       mprintf( 10, 55,        L"Number of items:  %d", s->usNumItems );
00532       mprintf( 10, 65,        L"Number of lights:  %d", s->usNumLights );
00533       mprintf( 10, 75,        L"Number of entry points:  %d", ePoints );
00534       if( ePoints )
00535       {
00536             INT32 x;
00537             x = 140;
00538             mprintf( x, 75, L"(" );
00539             x += StringPixLength( L"(", FONT10ARIAL ) + 2;
00540             if( m->sNorthGridNo                 != -1 )     {     mprintf( x, 75, L"N" ); x += StringPixLength( L"N", FONT10ARIAL ) + 2; }
00541             if( m->sEastGridNo                  != -1 )     {     mprintf( x, 75, L"E" ); x += StringPixLength( L"E", FONT10ARIAL ) + 2; }
00542             if( m->sSouthGridNo                 != -1 )     {     mprintf( x, 75, L"S" ); x += StringPixLength( L"S", FONT10ARIAL ) + 2; }
00543             if( m->sWestGridNo                  != -1 )     {     mprintf( x, 75, L"W" ); x += StringPixLength( L"W", FONT10ARIAL ) + 2; }
00544             if( m->sCenterGridNo          != -1 )     {     mprintf( x, 75, L"C" ); x += StringPixLength( L"C", FONT10ARIAL ) + 2; }
00545             if( m->sIsolatedGridNo  != -1 )     {     mprintf( x, 75, L"I" ); x += StringPixLength( L"I", FONT10ARIAL ) + 2; }
00546             mprintf( x, 75, L")" );
00547       }
00548       mprintf( 10, 85,        L"Number of rooms:  %d", s->ubNumRooms );
00549       mprintf( 10, 95,        L"Total map population:  %d", m->ubNumIndividuals );
00550       mprintf( 20, 105,             L"Enemies:  %d", s->EnemyTeam.ubTotal );
00551       mprintf( 30, 115,             L"Admins:  %d", s->ubNumAdmins );
00552       if( s->ubNumAdmins )
00553             mprintf( 100, 115,                  L"(%d detailed, %d profile -- %d have priority existance)", s->ubAdminDetailed, s->ubAdminProfile, s->ubAdminExistance );
00554       mprintf( 30, 125,             L"Troops:  %d", s->ubNumTroops );
00555       if( s->ubNumTroops )
00556             mprintf( 100, 125,                  L"(%d detailed, %d profile -- %d have priority existance)", s->ubTroopDetailed, s->ubTroopProfile, s->ubTroopExistance );
00557       mprintf( 30, 135,             L"Elites:  %d", s->ubNumElites );
00558       if( s->ubNumElites )
00559             mprintf( 100, 135,                  L"(%d detailed, %d profile -- %d have priority existance)", s->ubEliteDetailed, s->ubEliteProfile, s->ubEliteExistance );
00560       mprintf( 20, 145,             L"Civilians:  %d", s->CivTeam.ubTotal );
00561       if( s->CivTeam.ubTotal )
00562             mprintf( 100, 145,                  L"(%d detailed, %d profile -- %d have priority existance)", s->CivTeam.ubDetailed, s->CivTeam.ubProfile, s->CivTeam.ubExistance ); 
00563       if( s->ubSummaryVersion >= 9 )
00564       {
00565             mprintf( 30, 155,         L"Humans:  %d", s->CivTeam.ubTotal - s->ubCivCows - s->ubCivBloodcats );
00566             mprintf( 30, 165,             L"Cows:  %d", s->ubCivCows );
00567             mprintf( 30, 175,             L"Bloodcats:  %d", s->ubCivBloodcats );
00568       }
00569       mprintf( 20, 185,             L"Creatures:  %d", s->CreatureTeam.ubTotal );
00570       if( s->ubSummaryVersion >= 9 )
00571       {
00572             mprintf( 30, 195,     L"Monsters:  %d", s->CreatureTeam.ubTotal - s->CreatureTeam.ubNumAnimals );
00573             mprintf( 30, 205,     L"Bloodcats:  %d", s->CreatureTeam.ubNumAnimals );
00574       }
00575       mprintf( 10, 215,       L"Number of locked and/or trapped doors:  %d", s->ubNumDoors );
00576       mprintf( 20, 225,             L"Locked:  %d", s->ubNumDoorsLocked );
00577       mprintf( 20, 235,             L"Trapped:  %d", s->ubNumDoorsTrapped );
00578       mprintf( 20, 245,             L"Locked & Trapped:  %d", s->ubNumDoorsLockedAndTrapped );
00579       if( s->ubSummaryVersion >= 8 )
00580             mprintf( 10, 255,             L"Civilians with schedules:  %d", s->ubCivSchedules );
00581       if( s->ubSummaryVersion >= 10 )
00582       {
00583             if( s->fTooManyExitGridDests )
00584             {
00585                   SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
00586                   mprintf( 10, 265, L"Too many exit grid destinations (more than 4)...");
00587             }
00588             else
00589             {
00590                   UINT8 i;
00591                   UINT8 ubNumInvalid = 0;
00592                   for( i = 0; i < 4; i++ )
00593                   {
00594                         if( s->fInvalidDest[i] )
00595                               ubNumInvalid++;
00596                   }
00597                   if( ubNumInvalid )
00598                   {
00599                         SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
00600                         mprintf( 10, 265, L"ExitGrids:  %d (%d with a long distance destination)", s->ubNumExitGridDests, ubNumInvalid );
00601                   }
00602                   else switch( s->ubNumExitGridDests )
00603                   {
00604                         case 0:
00605                               mprintf( 10, 265, L"ExitGrids:  none" );
00606                               break;
00607                         case 1:
00608                               mprintf( 10, 265, L"ExitGrids:  1 destination using %d exitgrids", s->usExitGridSize[0] );
00609                               break;
00610                         case 2:
00611                               mprintf( 10, 265, L"ExitGrids:  2 -- 1) Qty: %d, 2) Qty: %d", s->usExitGridSize[0], s->usExitGridSize[1] );
00612                               break;
00613                         case 3:
00614                               mprintf( 10, 265, L"ExitGrids:  3 -- 1) Qty: %d, 2) Qty: %d, 3) Qty: %d", 
00615                                     s->usExitGridSize[0], s->usExitGridSize[1], s->usExitGridSize[2] );
00616                               break;
00617                         case 4:
00618                               mprintf( 10, 265, L"ExitGrids:  3 -- 1) Qty: %d, 2) Qty: %d, 3) Qty: %d, 4) Qty: %d", 
00619                                     s->usExitGridSize[0], s->usExitGridSize[1], s->usExitGridSize[2], s->usExitGridSize[3] );
00620                               break;
00621                   }
00622             }
00623       }
00624       iOverall = - ( 2 * s->EnemyTeam.ubBadA ) - s->EnemyTeam.ubPoorA + s->EnemyTeam.ubGoodA + ( 2 * s->EnemyTeam.ubGreatA );
00625       usLine = 275;
00626       mprintf( 10, usLine, L"Enemy Relative Attributes:  %d bad, %d poor, %d norm, %d good, %d great (%+d Overall)",
00627             s->EnemyTeam.ubBadA, 
00628             s->EnemyTeam.ubPoorA, 
00629             s->EnemyTeam.ubAvgA, 
00630             s->EnemyTeam.ubGoodA, 
00631             s->EnemyTeam.ubGreatA,
00632             iOverall );
00633       iOverall = - ( 2 * s->EnemyTeam.ubBadE ) - s->EnemyTeam.ubPoorE + s->EnemyTeam.ubGoodE + ( 2 * s->EnemyTeam.ubGreatE );
00634       usLine += 10;
00635       mprintf( 10, usLine, L"Enemy Relative Equipment:  %d bad, %d poor, %d norm, %d good, %d great (%+d Overall)",
00636             s->EnemyTeam.ubBadE, 
00637             s->EnemyTeam.ubPoorE, 
00638             s->EnemyTeam.ubAvgE, 
00639             s->EnemyTeam.ubGoodE, 
00640             s->EnemyTeam.ubGreatE,
00641             iOverall );
00642       usLine += 10;
00643       if( s->ubSummaryVersion >= 11 )
00644       {
00645             if( s->ubEnemiesReqWaypoints )
00646             {
00647                   SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
00648                   mprintf( 10, usLine, L"%d placements have patrol orders without any waypoints defined.", s->ubEnemiesReqWaypoints );
00649                   usLine += 10;
00650             }
00651       }
00652       if( s->ubSummaryVersion >= 13 )
00653       {
00654             if( s->ubEnemiesHaveWaypoints )
00655             {
00656                   SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
00657                   mprintf( 10, usLine, L"%d placements have waypoints, but without any patrol orders.", s->ubEnemiesHaveWaypoints );
00658                   usLine += 10;
00659             }
00660       }
00661       if( s->ubSummaryVersion >= 12 )
00662       {
00663             if( s->usWarningRoomNums )
00664             {
00665                   SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
00666                   mprintf( 10, usLine, L"%d gridnos have questionable room numbers.  Please validate.", s->usWarningRoomNums );
00667             }
00668       }
00669 }
00670 
00671 //2)  CODE TRIGGER/ACTION NAMES
00672 void RenderItemDetails()
00673 {
00674       FLOAT dAvgExistChance, dAvgStatus;
00675       OBJECTTYPE *pItem;
00676       INT32 index, i;
00677       UINT16 str[100];
00678       UINT32 uiQuantity, uiExistChance, uiStatus;
00679       UINT32 uiTriggerQuantity[8], uiActionQuantity[8], uiTriggerExistChance[8], uiActionExistChance[8];
00680       UINT32 xp, yp;
00681       INT8 bFreqIndex;
00682       SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
00683       SetFontForeground( FONT_GRAY2 );
00684       SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
00685       mprintf( 364, 49, L"R" );
00686       mprintf( 390, 49, L"S" );
00687       mprintf( 364, 62, L"Enemy" );
00688       yp = 20;
00689       xp = 5;
00690       if( gubSummaryItemMode != ITEMMODE_ENEMY && gpWorldItemsSummaryArray )
00691       {
00692             memset( uiTriggerQuantity, 0, 32 );
00693             memset( uiActionQuantity, 0, 32 );
00694             memset( uiTriggerExistChance, 0, 32 );
00695             memset( uiActionExistChance, 0, 32 );
00696             for( index = 1; index < MAXITEMS; index++ )
00697             {
00698                   if ( Item[index].usItemClass  == 0 )
00699                         break;
00700                   uiQuantity = 0;
00701                   uiExistChance = 0;
00702                   uiStatus = 0;
00703                   for( i = 0; i < gusWorldItemsSummaryArraySize; i++ )
00704                   {
00705                         if( index == SWITCH || index == ACTION_ITEM )
00706                         {
00707                               if( gpWorldItemsSummaryArray[ i ].o.usItem == index )
00708                               {
00709                                     if( gubSummaryItemMode == ITEMMODE_SCIFI && !(gpWorldItemsSummaryArray[ i ].usFlags & WORLD_ITEM_REALISTIC_ONLY) || 
00710                                                 gubSummaryItemMode == ITEMMODE_REAL && !(gpWorldItemsSummaryArray[ i ].usFlags & WORLD_ITEM_SCIFI_ONLY) )
00711                                     {
00712                                           pItem = &gpWorldItemsSummaryArray[ i ].o;
00713                                           if( !pItem->bFrequency )
00714                                                 bFreqIndex = 7;
00715                                           else if( pItem->bFrequency == PANIC_FREQUENCY )
00716                                                 bFreqIndex = 0;
00717                                           else if( pItem->bFrequency == PANIC_FREQUENCY_2 )
00718                                                 bFreqIndex = 1;
00719                                           else if( pItem->bFrequency == PANIC_FREQUENCY_3 )
00720                                                 bFreqIndex = 2;
00721                                           else if( pItem->bFrequency == FIRST_MAP_PLACED_FREQUENCY + 1 )
00722                                                 bFreqIndex = 3;
00723                                           else if( pItem->bFrequency == FIRST_MAP_PLACED_FREQUENCY + 2 )
00724                                                 bFreqIndex = 4;
00725                                           else if( pItem->bFrequency == FIRST_MAP_PLACED_FREQUENCY + 3 )
00726                                                 bFreqIndex = 5;
00727                                           else if( pItem->bFrequency == FIRST_MAP_PLACED_FREQUENCY + 4 )
00728                                                 bFreqIndex = 6;
00729                                           else
00730                                                 continue;
00731                                           if( index == SWITCH )
00732                                           {
00733                                                 uiTriggerQuantity[ bFreqIndex ]++;
00734                                                 uiTriggerExistChance[ bFreqIndex ] += 100 - gpWorldItemsSummaryArray[ i ].ubNonExistChance;
00735                                           }
00736                                           else
00737                                           {
00738                                                 uiActionQuantity[ bFreqIndex ]++;
00739                                                 uiActionExistChance[ bFreqIndex ] += 100 - gpWorldItemsSummaryArray[ i ].ubNonExistChance;
00740                                           }
00741                                     }
00742                               }
00743                               continue;
00744                         }
00745                         if( gpWorldItemsSummaryArray[ i ].o.usItem == index )
00746                         {
00747                               if( gubSummaryItemMode == ITEMMODE_SCIFI && !(gpWorldItemsSummaryArray[ i ].usFlags & WORLD_ITEM_REALISTIC_ONLY) || 
00748                                       gubSummaryItemMode == ITEMMODE_REAL  && !(gpWorldItemsSummaryArray[ i ].usFlags & WORLD_ITEM_SCIFI_ONLY) )
00749                               {
00750                                     pItem = &gpWorldItemsSummaryArray[ i ].o;
00751                                     uiExistChance += (100 - gpWorldItemsSummaryArray[ i ].ubNonExistChance) * pItem->ubNumberOfObjects;
00752                                     uiStatus += pItem->bStatus[0];
00753                                     uiQuantity += pItem->ubNumberOfObjects;
00754                               }
00755                         }
00756                   }
00757                   if( uiQuantity )
00758                   {
00759                         if( !(yp % 20) )
00760                               SetFontForeground( FONT_LTKHAKI );
00761                         else
00762                               SetFontForeground( FONT_GRAY2 );
00763                         //calc averages
00764                         dAvgExistChance = (FLOAT)(uiExistChance / 100.0);
00765                         dAvgStatus = uiStatus / (FLOAT)uiQuantity;
00766                         //Display stats.
00767                         LoadShortNameItemInfo( (UINT16)index, str );
00768                         mprintf( xp, yp, L"%s", str );
00769                         mprintf( xp + 85, yp, L"%3.02f", dAvgExistChance ); 
00770                         mprintf( xp + 110, yp, L"@ %3.02f%%", dAvgStatus );
00771                         yp += 10;
00772                         if( yp >= 355 )
00773                         {
00774                               xp += 170;
00775                               yp = 20;
00776                               if( xp >= 300 )
00777                               {
00778                                     SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
00779                                     mprintf( 350, 350, L"TOO MANY ITEMS TO DISPLAY!");
00780                                     return;
00781                               }
00782                         }
00783                   }
00784             }
00785             //Now list the number of actions/triggers of each type
00786             for( i = 0; i < 8; i++ )
00787             {
00788                   if( uiTriggerQuantity[i] || uiActionQuantity[i] )
00789                   {
00790                         if( i == 7 )
00791                               SetFontForeground( FONT_DKYELLOW );
00792                         else if( !uiTriggerQuantity[i] || !uiActionQuantity[i] )
00793                               SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
00794                         else
00795                               SetFontForeground( 77 );
00796                         switch( i )
00797                         {
00798                               case 0: swprintf( str, L"Panic1" );       break;
00799                               case 1:     swprintf( str, L"Panic2" );         break;
00800                               case 2:     swprintf( str, L"Panic3" );         break;
00801                               case 3:     swprintf( str, L"Norm1" );          break;
00802                               case 4:     swprintf( str, L"Norm2" );          break;
00803                               case 5:     swprintf( str, L"Norm3" );          break;
00804                               case 6:     swprintf( str, L"Norm4" );          break;
00805                               case 7:     swprintf( str, L"Pressure Actions" );           break;
00806                         }
00807                         if( i < 7 )
00808                         {
00809                               dAvgExistChance = (FLOAT)(uiTriggerExistChance[i] / 100.0);
00810                               dAvgStatus = (FLOAT)(uiActionExistChance[i] / 100.0);
00811                               mprintf( xp, yp, L"%s:  %3.02f trigger(s), %3.02f action(s)", str, dAvgExistChance, dAvgStatus );
00812                         }
00813                         else 
00814                         {
00815                               dAvgExistChance = (FLOAT)(uiActionExistChance[i] / 100.0);
00816                               mprintf( xp, yp, L"%s:  %3.02f", str, dAvgExistChance );
00817                         }
00818                         yp += 10;
00819                         if( yp >= 355 )
00820                         {
00821                               xp += 170;
00822                               yp = 20;
00823                               if( xp >= 300 )
00824                               {
00825                                     SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
00826                                     mprintf( 350, 350, L"TOO MANY ITEMS TO DISPLAY!");
00827                                     return;
00828                               }
00829                         }
00830                   }
00831             }
00832       }
00833       else if( gubSummaryItemMode == ITEMMODE_ENEMY )
00834       {
00835             
00836             SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
00837             mprintf( xp, yp, L"PRIORITY ENEMY DROPPED ITEMS" );
00838             yp += 10;
00839 
00840             //Do the priority existance guys first
00841             if( !gpPEnemyItemsSummaryArray )
00842             {
00843                   SetFontForeground( FONT_DKYELLOW );
00844                   mprintf( xp, yp, L"None" );
00845                   yp += 10;
00846             }
00847             else for( index = 1; index < MAXITEMS; index++ )
00848             {
00849                   if ( Item[index].usItemClass  == 0 )
00850                         break;
00851                   uiQuantity = 0;
00852                   uiExistChance = 0;
00853                   uiStatus = 0;
00854                   for( i = 0; i < gusPEnemyItemsSummaryArraySize; i++ )
00855                   {
00856                         if( gpPEnemyItemsSummaryArray[ i ].usItem == index )
00857                         {
00858                               pItem = &gpPEnemyItemsSummaryArray[ i ];
00859                               uiExistChance += 100 * pItem->ubNumberOfObjects;
00860                               uiStatus += pItem->bStatus[0];
00861                               uiQuantity += pItem->ubNumberOfObjects;
00862                         }
00863                   }
00864                   if( uiQuantity )
00865                   {
00866                         if( !(yp % 20) )
00867                               SetFontForeground( FONT_LTKHAKI );
00868                         else
00869                               SetFontForeground( FONT_GRAY2 );
00870                         //calc averages
00871                         dAvgExistChance = (FLOAT)(uiExistChance / 100.0);
00872                         dAvgStatus = uiStatus / (FLOAT)uiQuantity;
00873                         //Display stats.
00874                         LoadShortNameItemInfo( (UINT16)index, str );
00875                         mprintf( xp, yp, L"%s", str );
00876                         mprintf( xp + 85, yp, L"%3.02f", dAvgExistChance ); 
00877                         mprintf( xp + 110, yp, L"@ %3.02f%%", dAvgStatus );
00878                         yp += 10;
00879                         if( yp >= 355 )
00880                         {
00881                               xp += 170;
00882                               yp = 20;
00883                               if( xp >= 300 )
00884                               {
00885                                     SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
00886                                     mprintf( 350, 350, L"TOO MANY ITEMS TO DISPLAY!");
00887                                     return;
00888                               }
00889                         }
00890                   }
00891             }
00892 
00893             yp += 5;
00894       
00895             SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
00896             mprintf( xp, yp, L"NORMAL ENEMY DROPPED ITEMS" );
00897             yp += 10;
00898             if( yp >= 355 )
00899             {
00900                   xp += 170;
00901                   yp = 20;
00902                   if( xp >= 300 )
00903                   {
00904                         SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
00905                         mprintf( 350, 350, L"TOO MANY ITEMS TO DISPLAY!");
00906                         return;
00907                   }
00908             }
00909 
00910             //Do the priority existance guys first
00911             if( !gpNEnemyItemsSummaryArray )
00912             {
00913                   SetFontForeground( FONT_DKYELLOW );
00914                   mprintf( xp, yp, L"None" );
00915                   yp += 10;
00916             }
00917             for( index = 1; index < MAXITEMS; index++ )
00918             {
00919                   if ( Item[index].usItemClass  == 0 )
00920                         break;
00921                   uiQuantity = 0;
00922                   uiExistChance = 0;
00923                   uiStatus = 0;
00924                   for( i = 0; i < gusNEnemyItemsSummaryArraySize; i++ )
00925                   {
00926                         if( gpNEnemyItemsSummaryArray[ i ].usItem == index )
00927                         {
00928                               pItem = &gpNEnemyItemsSummaryArray[ i ];
00929                               uiExistChance += 100 * pItem->ubNumberOfObjects;
00930                               uiStatus += pItem->bStatus[0];
00931                               uiQuantity += pItem->ubNumberOfObjects;
00932                         }
00933                   }
00934                   if( uiQuantity )
00935                   {
00936                         if( !(yp % 20) )
00937                               SetFontForeground( FONT_LTKHAKI );
00938                         else
00939                               SetFontForeground( FONT_GRAY2 );
00940                         //calc averages
00941                         dAvgExistChance = (FLOAT)(uiExistChance / 100.0);
00942                         dAvgStatus = uiStatus / (FLOAT)uiQuantity;
00943                         //Display stats.
00944                         LoadShortNameItemInfo( (UINT16)index, str );
00945                         mprintf( xp, yp, L"%s", str );
00946                         mprintf( xp + 85, yp, L"%3.02f", dAvgExistChance ); 
00947                         mprintf( xp + 110, yp, L"@ %3.02f%%", dAvgStatus );
00948                         yp += 10;
00949                         if( yp >= 355 )
00950                         {
00951                               xp += 170;
00952                               yp = 20;
00953                               if( xp >= 300 )
00954                               {
00955                                     SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
00956                                     mprintf( 350, 350, L"TOO MANY ITEMS TO DISPLAY!");
00957                                     return;
00958                               }
00959                         }
00960                   }
00961             }
00962       
00963       
00964       
00965       }
00966       else
00967       {
00968             SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
00969             mprintf( 5, 50, L"ERROR:  Can't load the items for this map.  Reason unknown." );
00970       }
00971 }
00972 
00973 void RenderSummaryWindow()
00974 {
00975       UINT8 *pDestBuf;
00976       UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
00977       SGPRect ClipRect;
00978       INT32 i, x, y;
00979       if( (GetActiveFieldID() == 1 ) != gfTempFile )
00980       {
00981             gfTempFile ^= 1;
00982             SetInputFieldStringWith16BitString( 1, L"" );
00983             gfRenderSummary = TRUE;
00984       }
00985       if( gfTempFile ) //constantly extract the temp filename for updating purposes.
00986             ExtractTempFilename();
00987       if( gfRenderSummary )
00988       {
00989             gfRenderSummary = FALSE;
00990             gfRenderMap = TRUE;
00991             for( i = 1; i < NUM_SUMMARY_BUTTONS; i++ )
00992             {
00993                   MarkAButtonDirty( iSummaryButton[ i ] );
00994             }
00995 
00996             DrawButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_BACKGROUND ] );
00997             InvalidateRegion( 0, 0, 640, 360 );
00998             
00999             SetFont( BLOCKFONT2 );
01000             SetFontForeground( FONT_LTKHAKI );
01001             SetFontShadow( FONT_DKKHAKI );
01002             SetFontBackground( 0 );
01003             if( !gfItemDetailsMode )
01004             {
01005                   mprintf( 10, 5, L"CAMPAIGN EDITOR -- %s Version 1.%02d", 
01006                         gszVersionType[ GLOBAL_SUMMARY_STATE ], GLOBAL_SUMMARY_VERSION );
01007             }
01008             
01009             //This section builds the proper header to be displayed for an existing global summary.
01010             if( !gfWorldLoaded )
01011             {
01012                   SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
01013                   SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
01014                   mprintf( 270, 5, L"(NO MAP LOADED).");
01015             }
01016             SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
01017             SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
01018             if( gfGlobalSummaryExists )
01019             {
01020                   UINT16 str[100];
01021                   BOOLEAN fSectorSummaryExists = FALSE;
01022                   if( gusNumEntriesWithOutdatedOrNoSummaryInfo && !gfOutdatedDenied )
01023                   {
01024                         DisableButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_LOAD ] );
01025                         SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
01026                         mprintf( 10, 20, L"You currently have %d outdated maps.", gusNumEntriesWithOutdatedOrNoSummaryInfo);
01027                         mprintf( 10, 30, L"The more maps that need to be updated, the longer it takes.  It'll take ");
01028                         mprintf( 10, 40, L"approximately 4 minutes on a P200MMX to analyse 100 maps, so");
01029                         mprintf( 10, 50, L"depending on your computer, it may vary.");
01030                         SetFontForeground( FONT_LTRED );
01031                         mprintf( 10, 65, L"Do you wish to regenerate info for ALL these maps at this time (y/n)?" );
01032                   }
01033                   else if( !gsSelSectorX && !gsSectorX || gfTempFile )
01034                   {
01035                         DisableButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_LOAD ] );
01036                         SetFontForeground( FONT_LTRED );
01037                         mprintf( 10, 20, L"There is no sector currently selected." );
01038                         if( gfTempFile )
01039                         {
01040                               SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
01041                               mprintf( 10, 30, L"Entering a temp file name that doesn't follow campaign editor conventions..." );
01042                               goto SPECIALCASE_LABEL;  //OUCH!!!
01043                         }
01044                         else if( !gfWorldLoaded )
01045                         {
01046                               SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
01047                               mprintf( 10, 30, L"You need to either load an existing map or create a new map before being" );
01048                               mprintf( 10, 40, L"able to enter the editor, or you can quit (ESC or Alt+x).");
01049                         }
01050                   }
01051                   else
01052                   {
01053                         //Build sector string
01054                         if( gsSelSectorX )
01055                               x = gsSelSectorX - 1, y = gsSelSectorY - 1;
01056                         else
01057                               x = gsSectorX - 1, y = gsSectorY - 1;
01058                         swprintf( str, L"%c%d", y + 'A', x + 1 );
01059                         swprintf( gszFilename, str );
01060                         giCurrLevel = giCurrentViewLevel;
01061                         switch( giCurrentViewLevel )
01062                         {
01063                               case ALL_LEVELS_MASK:
01064                                     //search for the highest level
01065                                     fSectorSummaryExists = TRUE;
01066                                     if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & GROUND_LEVEL_MASK )
01067                                           giCurrLevel = GROUND_LEVEL_MASK;
01068                                     else if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & BASEMENT1_LEVEL_MASK )
01069                                           giCurrLevel = BASEMENT1_LEVEL_MASK;
01070                                     else if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & BASEMENT2_LEVEL_MASK )
01071                                           giCurrLevel = BASEMENT2_LEVEL_MASK;
01072                                     else if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & BASEMENT3_LEVEL_MASK )
01073                                           giCurrLevel = BASEMENT3_LEVEL_MASK;
01074                                     else
01075                                           fSectorSummaryExists = FALSE;
01076                                     break;
01077                               case ALTERNATE_LEVELS_MASK:
01078                                     //search for the highest alternate level
01079                                     fSectorSummaryExists = TRUE;
01080                                     if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & ALTERNATE_GROUND_MASK )
01081                                           giCurrLevel = ALTERNATE_GROUND_MASK;
01082                                     else if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & ALTERNATE_B1_MASK )
01083                                           giCurrLevel = ALTERNATE_B1_MASK;
01084                                     else if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & ALTERNATE_B2_MASK )
01085                                           giCurrLevel = ALTERNATE_B2_MASK;
01086                                     else if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & ALTERNATE_B3_MASK )
01087                                           giCurrLevel = ALTERNATE_B3_MASK;
01088                                     else
01089                                           fSectorSummaryExists = FALSE;
01090                                     break;
01091                               case GROUND_LEVEL_MASK:
01092                                     if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & GROUND_LEVEL_MASK )
01093                                           fSectorSummaryExists = TRUE;
01094                                     break;
01095                               case BASEMENT1_LEVEL_MASK:
01096                                     if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & BASEMENT1_LEVEL_MASK )
01097                                           fSectorSummaryExists = TRUE;
01098                                     break;
01099                               case BASEMENT2_LEVEL_MASK:
01100                                     if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & BASEMENT2_LEVEL_MASK )
01101                                           fSectorSummaryExists = TRUE;
01102                                     break;
01103                               case BASEMENT3_LEVEL_MASK:
01104                                     if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & BASEMENT3_LEVEL_MASK )
01105                                           fSectorSummaryExists = TRUE;
01106                                     break;
01107                               case ALTERNATE_GROUND_MASK:
01108                                     if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & ALTERNATE_GROUND_MASK )
01109                                           fSectorSummaryExists = TRUE;
01110                                     break;
01111                               case ALTERNATE_B1_MASK:
01112                                     if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & ALTERNATE_B1_MASK )
01113                                           fSectorSummaryExists = TRUE;
01114                                     break;
01115                               case ALTERNATE_B2_MASK:
01116                                     if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & ALTERNATE_B2_MASK )
01117                                           fSectorSummaryExists = TRUE;
01118                                     break;
01119                               case ALTERNATE_B3_MASK:
01120                                     if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & ALTERNATE_B3_MASK )
01121                                           fSectorSummaryExists = TRUE;
01122                                     break;
01123                         }
01124                         if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] )
01125                         {
01126                               switch( giCurrLevel )
01127                               {
01128                                     case GROUND_LEVEL_MASK:             
01129                                           giCurrLevel = 0;
01130                                           wcscat( str, L", ground level" );                           
01131                                           gpCurrentSectorSummary = gpSectorSummary[x][y][0];
01132                                           break;
01133                                     case BASEMENT1_LEVEL_MASK:    
01134                                           giCurrLevel = 1;
01135                                           wcscat( str, L", underground level 1" );  
01136                                           gpCurrentSectorSummary = gpSectorSummary[x][y][1];
01137                                           break;
01138                                     case BASEMENT2_LEVEL_MASK:    
01139                                           giCurrLevel = 2;
01140                                           wcscat( str, L", underground level 2" );  
01141                                           gpCurrentSectorSummary = gpSectorSummary[x][y][2];
01142                                           break;
01143                                     case BASEMENT3_LEVEL_MASK:    
01144                                           giCurrLevel = 3;
01145                                           wcscat( str, L", underground level 3" );  
01146                                           gpCurrentSectorSummary = gpSectorSummary[x][y][3];
01147                                           break;
01148                                     case ALTERNATE_GROUND_MASK:               
01149                                           giCurrLevel = 4;
01150                                           wcscat( str, L", alternate G level" );                            
01151                                           gpCurrentSectorSummary = gpSectorSummary[x][y][4];
01152                                           break;
01153                                     case ALTERNATE_B1_MASK: 
01154                                           giCurrLevel = 5;
01155                                           wcscat( str, L", alternate B1 level" );   
01156                                           gpCurrentSectorSummary = gpSectorSummary[x][y][5];
01157                                           break;
01158                                     case ALTERNATE_B2_MASK: 
01159                                           giCurrLevel = 6;
01160                                           wcscat( str, L", alternate B2 level" );   
01161                                           gpCurrentSectorSummary = gpSectorSummary[x][y][6];
01162                                           break;
01163                                     case ALTERNATE_B3_MASK: 
01164                                           giCurrLevel = 7;
01165                                           wcscat( str, L", alternate B3 level" );   
01166                                           gpCurrentSectorSummary = gpSectorSummary[x][y][7];
01167                                           break;
01168                               }
01169                         }
01170                         else
01171                         {
01172                               DisableButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_LOAD ] );
01173                         }
01174                         if( fSectorSummaryExists )
01175                         {
01176                               switch( giCurrLevel )
01177                               {
01178                                     case 0:     wcscat( gszFilename, L".dat" );                       break;
01179                                     case 1:     wcscat( gszFilename, L"_b1.dat" );        break;
01180                                     case 2:     wcscat( gszFilename, L"_b2.dat" );        break;
01181                                     case 3:     wcscat( gszFilename, L"_b3.dat" );        break;
01182                                     case 4:     wcscat( gszFilename, L"_a.dat" );               break;
01183                                     case 5:     wcscat( gszFilename, L"_b1_a.dat" );      break;
01184                                     case 6:     wcscat( gszFilename, L"_b2_a.dat" );      break;
01185                                     case 7:     wcscat( gszFilename, L"_b3_a.dat" );      break;
01186                               }
01187                               swprintf( gszDisplayName, gszFilename );
01188                               EnableButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_LOAD ] );
01189                               if( gpCurrentSectorSummary )
01190                               {
01191                                     if( gpCurrentSectorSummary->ubSummaryVersion < GLOBAL_SUMMARY_VERSION )
01192                                           ShowButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_UPDATE ] );
01193                                     else
01194                                           HideButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_UPDATE ] );
01195                                     if( !gfAlternateMaps )
01196                                           SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
01197                                     else
01198                                           SetFontForeground( FONT_LTBLUE );
01199                                     if( gfItemDetailsMode )
01200                                     {
01201                                           if( gfSetupItemDetailsMode )
01202                                           {
01203                                                 SetupItemDetailsMode( TRUE );
01204                                                 gfSetupItemDetailsMode = FALSE;
01205                                           }
01206                                           mprintf( 10, 5, L"ITEM DETAILS -- sector %s", str );
01207                                           RenderItemDetails();
01208                                     }
01209                                     else
01210                                     {
01211                                           mprintf( 10, 20, L"Summary Information for sector %s:", str );
01212                                           HideButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_REAL ] );
01213                                           HideButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_SCIFI ] );
01214                                           HideButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_ENEMY ] );
01215                                           RenderSectorInformation();
01216                                     }
01217                               }
01218                               else
01219                               {
01220                                     SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
01221                                     if( gfItemDetailsMode )
01222                                     {
01223                                           mprintf( 10, 5, L"Summary Information for sector %s" , str );
01224                                           mprintf( 10, 15, L"does not exist." );
01225                                     }
01226                                     else
01227                                     {
01228                                           mprintf( 10, 20, L"Summary Information for sector %s" , str );
01229                                           mprintf( 10, 30, L"does not exist." );
01230                                     }
01231                                     ShowButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_UPDATE ] );
01232                               }
01233                         }
01234                         else
01235                         {
01236                               if( !gfAlternateMaps )
01237                                     SetFontForeground( FONT_ORANGE );
01238                               else
01239                               {
01240                                     SetFontForeground( FONT_DKBLUE );
01241                                     SetFontShadow( 0 );
01242                               }
01243                               if( gfItemDetailsMode )
01244                                     mprintf( 10, 5, L"No information exists for sector %s.", str );
01245                               else
01246                                     mprintf( 10, 20, L"No information exists for sector %s.", str );
01247                               SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
01248 
01249                               switch( giCurrentViewLevel )
01250                               {
01251                                     case ALL_LEVELS_MASK:
01252                                     case GROUND_LEVEL_MASK:             wcscat( gszFilename, L".dat" );                       break;
01253                                     case BASEMENT1_LEVEL_MASK:    wcscat( gszFilename, L"_b1.dat" );        break;
01254                                     case BASEMENT2_LEVEL_MASK:    wcscat( gszFilename, L"_b2.dat" );        break;
01255                                     case BASEMENT3_LEVEL_MASK:    wcscat( gszFilename, L"_b3.dat" );        break;
01256                                     case ALTERNATE_LEVELS_MASK:
01257                                     case ALTERNATE_GROUND_MASK:   wcscat( gszFilename, L"_a.dat" );               break;
01258                                     case ALTERNATE_B1_MASK:             wcscat( gszFilename, L"_b1_a.dat" );      break;
01259                                     case ALTERNATE_B2_MASK:             wcscat( gszFilename, L"_b2_a.dat" );      break;
01260                                     case ALTERNATE_B3_MASK:             wcscat( gszFilename, L"_b3_a.dat" );      break;
01261                               }
01262                               swprintf( gszDisplayName, gszFilename );
01263                               DisableButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_LOAD ] );
01264                         }
01265                         SPECIALCASE_LABEL:
01266                         if( gfOverrideDirty && gfPersistantSummary )
01267                               CalculateOverrideStatus();
01268                         if( gubOverrideStatus == INACTIVE )
01269                         {
01270                               if( !gfAlternateMaps )
01271                                     SetFontForeground( FONT_LTKHAKI );
01272                               else
01273                                     SetFontForeground( FONT_LTBLUE );
01274                               mprintf( MAP_LEFT+110, MAP_BOTTOM+55, L"FILE:  %s", gszDisplayName );
01275                         }
01276                         else //little higher to make room for the override checkbox and text.
01277                         {
01278                               if( !gfAlternateMaps )
01279                                     SetFontForeground( FONT_LTKHAKI );
01280                               else
01281                                     SetFontForeground( FONT_LTBLUE );
01282                               mprintf( MAP_LEFT+110, MAP_BOTTOM+46, L"FILE:  %s", gszDisplayName );
01283                               if( gubOverrideStatus == READONLY )
01284                               {
01285                                     SetFontForeground( (UINT8)(gfOverride ? FONT_YELLOW : FONT_LTRED) );
01286                                     mprintf( MAP_LEFT+124, MAP_BOTTOM+61, L"Override READONLY" );
01287                               }
01288                               else
01289                               {
01290                                     SetFontForeground( (UINT8)(gfOverride ? FONT_YELLOW: FONT_ORANGE ) );
01291                                     mprintf( MAP_LEFT+124, MAP_BOTTOM+61, L"Overwrite File");
01292                               }
01293                         }
01294                   }
01295             }
01296             else if( !gfDeniedSummaryCreation )
01297             {
01298                   SetFontForeground( FONT_GRAY1 );
01299                   mprintf( 10, 20, L"You currently have no summary data.  By creating one, you will be able to keep track" );
01300                   mprintf( 10, 30, L"of information pertaining to all of the sectors you edit and save.  The creation process" );
01301                   mprintf( 10, 40, L"will analyse all maps in your \\MAPS directory, and generate a new one.  This could" );
01302                   mprintf( 10, 50, L"take a few minutes depending on how many valid maps you have.  Valid maps are" );
01303                   mprintf( 10, 60, L"maps following the proper naming convention from a1.dat - p16.dat.  Underground maps" );  
01304                   mprintf( 10, 70, L"are signified by appending _b1 to _b3 before the .dat (ex:  a9_b1.dat). ");
01305                   SetFontForeground( FONT_LTRED );
01306                   mprintf( 10, 85, L"Do you wish to do this now (y/n)?" );
01307             }

01314             SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );

01320             SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
01321             mprintf( 354, 18, L"Summary" );
01322             pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
01323             SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, 640, 480 );
01324             RectangleDraw( TRUE, 350, 15, 405, 28, 0, pDestBuf );
01325             UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
01326             ShadowVideoSurfaceRectUsingLowPercentTable( FRAME_BUFFER, 351, 16, 404, 27 );
01327             if( gpCurrentSectorSummary ) 
01328                   /*&& gpCurrentSectorSummary->usNumItems || 
01329                         gpPEnemyItemsSummaryArray && gusPEnemyItemsSummaryArraySize ||
01330                         gpNEnemyItemsSummaryArray && gusNEnemyItemsSummaryArraySize )*/
01331             {

01333             }
01334             else

01336                   SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
01337             }

01339             pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
01340             SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, 640, 480 );
01341             RectangleDraw( TRUE, 350, 30, 405, 43, 0, pDestBuf );
01342             UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
01343             if( gpCurrentSectorSummary )
01344                   /*&& gpCurrentSectorSummary->usNumItems || 
01345                         gpPEnemyItemsSummaryArray && gusPEnemyItemsSummaryArraySize ||
01346                         gpNEnemyItemsSummaryArray && gusNEnemyItemsSummaryArraySize )
01347                         */
01348             {
01349                   ShadowVideoSurfaceRectUsingLowPercentTable( FRAME_BUFFER, 351, 31, 404, 42 );
01350             }
01351             else

01354             }

01359 
01360       if( gfRenderMap )
01361       {
01362             gfRenderMap = FALSE;
01363             BltVideoObjectFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, guiOmertaMap, 0, MAP_LEFT-2, MAP_TOP-2, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01364             InvalidateRegion( MAP_LEFT-1, MAP_TOP-1, MAP_RIGHT+1, MAP_BOTTOM+1 );
01365             //Draw the coordinates
01366             SetFont( SMALLCOMPFONT );
01367             SetFontForeground( FONT_BLACK );
01368             for( y = 0; y < 16; y++ )
01369             {
01370                   mprintf( MAP_LEFT-8, MAP_TOP+4+y*13, L"%c", 65 + y );
01371             }

01373             {
01374                   UINT16 str[3];
01375                   swprintf( str, L"%d", x );
01376                   mprintf( MAP_LEFT+x*13-(13+StringPixLength( str, SMALLCOMPFONT ))/2, MAP_TOP-8, str );
01377             }

01379             {
01380                   UINT16 pos;
01381                   pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
01382                   SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, 640, 480 );
01383                   for( i = 1; i <= 15; i++ )
01384                   {
01385                         //draw vertical lines
01386                         pos = (UINT16)(i * 13 + MAP_LEFT);
01387                         LineDraw( TRUE, pos, MAP_TOP, pos, MAP_BOTTOM-1, 0, pDestBuf );
01388                         //draw horizontal lines
01389                         pos = (UINT16)(i * 13 + MAP_TOP);
01390                         LineDraw( TRUE, MAP_LEFT, pos, MAP_RIGHT-1, pos, 0, pDestBuf );
01391                   }
01392                   UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
01393             }
01394             if( gfRenderProgress )
01395             {
01396                   UINT8 ubNumUndergroundLevels;
01397                   UINT16 str[2];
01398                   for( y = 0; y < 16; y++ ) 
01399                   {
01400                         ClipRect.iTop = MAP_TOP + y*13;
01401                         ClipRect.iBottom = ClipRect.iTop + 12;
01402                         for( x = 0; x < 16; x++ )
01403                         {
01404                               if( giCurrentViewLevel == ALL_LEVELS_MASK )
01405                               {
01406                                     ubNumUndergroundLevels = 0;
01407                                     if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & BASEMENT1_LEVEL_MASK )           ubNumUndergroundLevels++;
01408                                     if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & BASEMENT2_LEVEL_MASK )           ubNumUndergroundLevels++;
01409                                     if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & BASEMENT3_LEVEL_MASK )           ubNumUndergroundLevels++;
01410                                     if( ubNumUndergroundLevels )
01411                                     { //display the number of underground levels.  If there
01412                                           //is no ground level, then it'll be shadowed.
01413                                           SetFont( SMALLCOMPFONT );
01414                                           SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
01415                                           swprintf( str, L"%d", ubNumUndergroundLevels );
01416                                           mprintf( MAP_LEFT + x*13 + 4, ClipRect.iTop + 4, str );
01417                                     }

01419                                     {
01420                                           if( !gfItemDetailsMode || !gpSectorSummary[x][y][0] || gpSectorSummary[x][y][0]->usNumItems )
01421                                                 continue;
01422                                     }
01423                               }
01424                               else if( giCurrentViewLevel == ALTERNATE_LEVELS_MASK )
01425                               {
01426                                     ubNumUndergroundLevels = 0;
01427                                     if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & ALTERNATE_B1_MASK )        ubNumUndergroundLevels++;
01428                                     if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & ALTERNATE_B2_MASK )        ubNumUndergroundLevels++;
01429                                     if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & ALTERNATE_B3_MASK )        ubNumUndergroundLevels++;
01430                                     if( ubNumUndergroundLevels )

01432                                           //is no ground level, then it'll be shadowed.

01434                                           SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
01435                                           swprintf( str, L"%d", ubNumUndergroundLevels );
01436                                           mprintf( MAP_LEFT + x*13 + 4, ClipRect.iTop + 4, str );
01437                                     }

01439                                     {
01440                                           if( !gfItemDetailsMode || !gpSectorSummary[x][y][4] || gpSectorSummary[x][y][4]->usNumItems )
01441                                                 continue;
01442                                     }

01445                               {
01446                                     if( !gfItemDetailsMode || !gpSectorSummary[x][y][giCurrLevel] || gpSectorSummary[x][y][giCurrLevel]->usNumItems )
01447                                           continue;
01448                               }

01450                               ClipRect.iRight = ClipRect.iLeft + 12;

01452                               Blt16BPPBufferShadowRect( (UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, &ClipRect );
01453                               if( giCurrentViewLevel == BASEMENT1_LEVEL_MASK ||
01454                                       giCurrentViewLevel == BASEMENT2_LEVEL_MASK ||
01455                                           giCurrentViewLevel == BASEMENT3_LEVEL_MASK || 
01456                                           giCurrentViewLevel == ALTERNATE_B1_MASK          ||
01457                                           giCurrentViewLevel == ALTERNATE_B2_MASK          ||
01458                                           giCurrentViewLevel == ALTERNATE_B3_MASK          )
01459                                     Blt16BPPBufferShadowRect( (UINT16*)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, &ClipRect );
01460                               UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
01461                         }
01462                   }
01463             }
01464       }
01465 
01466       if( gfGlobalSummaryExists )
01467       {
01468             pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );
01469             SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, 640, 480 );
01470             //Render the grid for the map currently residing in memory (blue).
01471             if( gfWorldLoaded && !gfTempFile && gsSectorX )

01474                   y = MAP_TOP + (gsSectorY-1) * 13 + 1;
01475                   RectangleDraw( TRUE, x, y, x+11, y+11, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 50, 50, 200 ) ), pDestBuf );
01476             }
01477 
01478             //Render the grid for the sector currently in focus (red).
01479             if( gsSelSectorX > 0 && !gfTempFile )
01480             {
01481                   x = MAP_LEFT + (gsSelSectorX-1) * 13 ;
01482                   y = MAP_TOP + (gsSelSectorY-1) * 13 ;
01483                   RectangleDraw( TRUE, x, y, x+13, y+13, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 200, 50, 50 ) ), pDestBuf );
01484             }
01485

01487             if( gsHiSectorX > 0 )
01488             {

01490                   y = MAP_TOP + (gsHiSectorY-1) * 13 - 1;

01492             }

01494       }
01495       //Check to see if the user clicked on one of the hot spot mode change areas.
01496       if( gfLeftButtonState )
01497       {
01498             if( !gfItemDetailsMode )
01499             {
01500                   if( gpCurrentSectorSummary )
01501                         /*&& gpCurrentSectorSummary->usNumItems ||

01503                               gpNEnemyItemsSummaryArray && gusNEnemyItemsSummaryArraySize )*/
01504                   {

01507                               gfItemDetailsMode = TRUE;

01509                               gfRenderSummary = TRUE;
01510                         }
01511                   }
01512             }
01513             else if( gfItemDetailsMode && gusMouseXPos >= 350 && gusMouseYPos >= 15 && gusMouseXPos <= 404 && gusMouseYPos <= 27 )
01514             {
01515                   gfItemDetailsMode = FALSE;
01516                   gfRenderSummary = TRUE;
01517             }
01518       }
01519 }
01520 
01521 void UpdateSectorSummary( UINT16 *gszFilename, BOOLEAN fUpdate )
01522 {
01523       UINT16 str[50];
01524       UINT8 szCoord[40];
01525       UINT16 *ptr;
01526       INT16 x, y;
01527 
01528       gfRenderSummary = TRUE;
01529       //Extract the sector
01530       if( gszFilename[2] < L'0' || gszFilename[2] > L'9' )
01531             x = gszFilename[1] - L'0';
01532       else
01533             x = (gszFilename[1] - L'0') * 10 + gszFilename[2] - L'0';
01534       if( gszFilename[0] >= 'a' )
01535             y = gszFilename[0] - L'a' + 1;
01536       else
01537             y = gszFilename[0] - L'A' + 1;
01538       gfMapFileDirty = FALSE;
01539       
01540       //Validate that the values extracted are in fact a sector
01541       if( x < 1 || x > 16 || y < 1 || y > 16 )
01542             return;
01543       gsSectorX = gsSelSectorX = x;
01544       gsSectorY = gsSelSectorY = y;
01545 
01546       //The idea here is to get a pointer to the filename's period, then
01547       //focus on the character previous to it.  If it is a 1, 2, or 3, then
01548       //the filename was in a basement level.  Otherwise, it is a ground level.
01549       ptr = wcsstr( gszFilename, L"_a.dat" );
01550       if( ptr )
01551       {
01552             ptr = wcsstr( gszFilename, L"_b" );
01553             if( ptr && ptr[2] >= '1' && ptr[2] <= '3' && ptr[5] == '.' )
01554             { //it's a alternate basement map
01555                   switch( ptr[2] )
01556                   {
01557                         case '1':         
01558                               gsSectorLayer = ALTERNATE_B1_MASK;
01559                               giCurrLevel = 5;
01560                               break;
01561                         case '2':         
01562                               gsSectorLayer = ALTERNATE_B2_MASK;
01563                               giCurrLevel = 6;
01564                               break;
01565                         case '3':         
01566                               gsSectorLayer = ALTERNATE_B3_MASK;
01567                               giCurrLevel = 7;
01568                               break;
01569                   }
01570             }
01571             else
01572             {
01573                   gsSectorLayer = ALTERNATE_GROUND_MASK;
01574                   giCurrLevel = 4;
01575             }
01576       }
01577       else
01578       {
01579             ptr = wcsstr( gszFilename, L"_b" );
01580             if( ptr && ptr[2] >= '1' && ptr[2] <= '3' && ptr[3] == '.' )
01581             { //it's a alternate basement map
01582                   switch( ptr[2] )
01583                   {
01584                         case '1':         
01585                               gsSectorLayer = BASEMENT1_LEVEL_MASK;
01586                               giCurrLevel = 1;
01587                               break;
01588                         case '2':         
01589                               gsSectorLayer = BASEMENT2_LEVEL_MASK;
01590                               giCurrLevel = 2;
01591                               break;
01592                         case '3':         
01593                               gsSectorLayer = BASEMENT3_LEVEL_MASK;
01594                               giCurrLevel = 3;
01595                               break;
01596                   }
01597             }
01598             else
01599             {
01600                   gsSectorLayer = GROUND_LEVEL_MASK;
01601                   giCurrLevel = 0;
01602             }
01603       }
01604 
01605       giCurrentViewLevel = gsSectorLayer;
01606       if( !(gbSectorLevels[gsSectorX-1][gsSectorY-1] & gsSectorLayer) )
01607       {
01608             //new sector map saved, so update the global file.
01609             gbSectorLevels[gsSectorX-1][gsSectorY-1] |= gsSectorLayer;
01610       }
01611 
01612       if( fUpdate )
01613       {
01614             SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
01615             SetFontForeground( FONT_LTKHAKI );
01616             SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
01617             swprintf( str, L"Analyzing map:  %s...", gszFilename );
01618 
01619             if( gfSummaryWindowActive )
01620             {
01621                   mprintf( MAP_LEFT, MAP_BOTTOM+100, str );
01622                   InvalidateRegion( MAP_LEFT, MAP_BOTTOM+100, MAP_LEFT+150,   MAP_BOTTOM+110 );
01623                   CreateProgressBar( 0, MAP_LEFT, MAP_BOTTOM+110, MAP_LEFT+140, MAP_BOTTOM+120 );
01624             }
01625             else
01626             {
01627                   mprintf( 320 - StringPixLength( str, FONT10ARIAL )/2, 190, str );
01628                   InvalidateRegion( 200, 190, 400, 200 );
01629                   CreateProgressBar( 0, 250, 200, 390, 210 );
01630             }
01631 
01632             sprintf( (char *)szCoord, "%S", gszFilename );
01633             if( gsSectorX > 9 )
01634                   szCoord[3] = '\0';
01635             else
01636                   szCoord[2] = '\0';
01637             gusNumEntriesWithOutdatedOrNoSummaryInfo++;
01638             EvaluateWorld( szCoord, (UINT8)giCurrLevel );
01639 
01640             RemoveProgressBar( 0 );
01641       }
01642       else
01643             gusNumEntriesWithOutdatedOrNoSummaryInfo++;
01644 }

01675                   gfAlternateMaps = FALSE;
