01734 void PerformTest()
01735 {
01736 #if 0
01737       OutputDebugString( "PERFORMING A NEW TEST -------------------------------------------------\n" );
01738       memset( gbDefaultSurfaceUsed, 0, sizeof( gbDefaultSurfaceUsed ) );
01739       giCurrentTilesetID = -1;
01740       switch( Random( 3 ) )
01741       {
01742             case 0:
01743                   LoadWorld( "J9.dat" );
01744                   break;
01745             case 1:
01746                   LoadWorld( "J9_b1.dat" );
01747                   break;
01748             case 2:
01749                   LoadWorld( "J9_b2.dat" );
01750                   break;
01751       }
01752 #endif
01753 }
01754 
01755 
01756 BOOLEAN HandleSummaryInput( InputAtom *pEvent )
01757 {
01758       if( !gfSummaryWindowActive )
01759             return FALSE;
01760       gfCtrlPressed = pEvent->usKeyState & CTRL_DOWN;
01761       if( !HandleTextInput( pEvent ) && pEvent->usEvent == KEY_DOWN || pEvent->usEvent == KEY_REPEAT )
01762       {
01763             INT32 x;
01764             switch( pEvent->usParam )
01765             {
01766                   case ESC:
01767                         if( !gfWorldLoaded )
01768                         {
01769                               DestroySummaryWindow();
01770                               pEvent->usParam = 'x';
01771                               pEvent->usKeyState |= ALT_DOWN;
01772                               gfOverheadMapDirty = TRUE;
01773                               return FALSE;
01774                         }
01775                   case ENTER:
01776                         if( GetActiveFieldID() == 1 )
01777                               SelectNextField();
01778                         else if( gfWorldLoaded )
01779                               DestroySummaryWindow();
01780                         break;
01781                   case F6:
01782                         PerformTest();
01783                         break;
01784                   case F7:
01785                         for( x = 0; x < 10; x++ )
01786                               PerformTest();
01787                         break;
01788                   case F8:
01789                         for( x = 0; x < 100; x++ )
01790                               PerformTest();
01791                         break;
01792                   case 'y':case 'Y':
01793                         if( gusNumEntriesWithOutdatedOrNoSummaryInfo && !gfOutdatedDenied )
01794                         {
01795                               gfRenderSummary = TRUE;
01796                               RegenerateSummaryInfoForAllOutdatedMaps();
01797                         }
01798                         if( !gfGlobalSummaryExists && !gfDeniedSummaryCreation )
01799                         {
01800                               gfGlobalSummaryExists = TRUE;
01801                               CreateGlobalSummary();
01802                               gfRenderSummary = TRUE;
01803                         }
01804                         break;
01805                   case 'n':case 'N':
01806                         if( gusNumEntriesWithOutdatedOrNoSummaryInfo && !gfOutdatedDenied )
01807                         {
01808                               gfOutdatedDenied = TRUE;
01809                               gfRenderSummary = TRUE;
01810                         }
01811                         if( !gfGlobalSummaryExists && !gfDeniedSummaryCreation )
01812                         {
01813                               gfDeniedSummaryCreation = TRUE;
01814                               gfRenderSummary = TRUE;
01815                         }
01816                         break;
01817                   case 'x':
01818                         if (pEvent->usKeyState & ALT_DOWN )
01819                         { 
01820                               DestroySummaryWindow();
01821                               return FALSE;
01822                         }
01823                         break;
01824                   case RIGHTARROW:
01825                         gfRenderSummary = TRUE;
01826                         if( !gsSelSectorY )
01827                               gsSelSectorY = 1;
01828                         gsSelSectorX++;
01829                         if( gsSelSectorX > 16 )
01830                               gsSelSectorX = 1;
01831                         break;
01832                   case LEFTARROW:
01833                         gfRenderSummary = TRUE;
01834                         if( !gsSelSectorY )
01835                               gsSelSectorY = 1;
01836                         gsSelSectorX--;
01837                         if( gsSelSectorX < 1 )
01838                               gsSelSectorX = 16;
01839                         break;
01840                   case UPARROW:
01841                         gfRenderSummary = TRUE;
01842                         if( !gsSelSectorX )
01843                               gsSelSectorX = 1;
01844                         gsSelSectorY--;
01845                         if( gsSelSectorY < 1 )
01846                               gsSelSectorY = 16;
01847                         break;
01848                   case DNARROW:
01849                         gfRenderSummary = TRUE;
01850                         if( !gsSelSectorX )
01851                               gsSelSectorX = 1;
01852                         gsSelSectorY++;
01853                         if( gsSelSectorY > 16 )
01854                               gsSelSectorY = 1;
01855                         break;
01856                   case SHIFT_LEFTARROW:
01857                         
01858                         break;
01859                   case SHIFT_RIGHTARROW:
01860 
01861                         break;
01862             }
01863       }
01864       else if( pEvent->usEvent == KEY_UP )
01865       { //for releasing modes requiring persistant state keys
01866             switch( pEvent->usParam )
01867             {
01868                   case F5:
01869                         ReleaseSummaryWindow();
01870                         break;
01871             }
01872       }
01873       return TRUE;
01874 }
01875 
01876 void CreateGlobalSummary()
01877 {
01878       FILE *fp;
01879       STRING512               Dir;
01880       STRING512               ExecDir;
01881 
01882       OutputDebugString( "Generating GlobalSummary Information...\n" );
01883 
01884       gfGlobalSummaryExists = FALSE;
01885       //Set current directory to JA2\DevInfo which contains all of the summary data
01886       GetExecutableDirectory( ExecDir );
01887       sprintf( Dir, "%s\\DevInfo", ExecDir );
01888 
01889       // Snap: save current directory
01890       //GetFileManCurrentDirectory( DataDir );
01891 
01892       //Directory doesn't exist, so create it, and continue.
01893       if( !MakeFileManDirectory( Dir ) )
01894             AssertMsg( 0, "Can't create new directory, JA2\\DevInfo for summary information." );
01895       if( !SetFileManCurrentDirectory( Dir ) )
01896             AssertMsg( 0, "Can't set to new directory, JA2\\DevInfo for summary information." );
01897       //Generate a simple readme file.
01898       fp = fopen( "readme.txt", "w" );
01899       Assert( fp );
01900       fprintf( fp, "%s\n%s\n", "This information is used in conjunction with the editor.",
01901             "This directory or it's contents shouldn't be included with final release." );
01902       fclose( fp );
01903 
01904       // Snap: Restore the data directory once we are finished.
01905       //SetFileManCurrentDirectory( DataDir );
01906       //sprintf( Dir, "%s\\Data", ExecDir );
01907       //SetFileManCurrentDirectory( Dir );
01908 
01909       LoadGlobalSummary();
01910       RegenerateSummaryInfoForAllOutdatedMaps();
01911       gfRenderSummary = TRUE;
01912 
01913       OutputDebugString( "GlobalSummary Information generated successfully.\n" );
01914 }
01915 
01916 void MapMoveCallback( MOUSE_REGION *reg, INT32 reason )
01917 {
01918       static INT16 gsPrevX = 0, gsPrevY = 0;
01919       //calc current sector highlighted.
01920       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
01921       {
01922             gsPrevX = gsHiSectorX = 0;
01923             gsPrevY = gsHiSectorY = 0;
01924             gfRenderMap = TRUE;
01925             return;
01926       }
01927       gsHiSectorX = min( (reg->RelativeXPos / 13) + 1, 16 );
01928       gsHiSectorY = min( (reg->RelativeYPos / 13) + 1, 16 );
01929       if( gsPrevX != gsHiSectorX || gsPrevY != gsHiSectorY )
01930       {
01931             gsPrevX = gsHiSectorX;
01932             gsPrevY = gsHiSectorY;
01933             gfRenderMap = TRUE;
01934       }
01935 }
01936 
01937 void MapClickCallback( MOUSE_REGION *reg, INT32 reason )
01938 {
01939       static INT16 sLastX = -1, sLastY = -1;
01940       static INT32 iLastClickTime = 0;
01941       //calc current sector selected.
01942       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01943       {
01944             if( GetActiveFieldID() == 1 )
01945             {
01946                   gsSelSectorX = 0;
01947                   SelectNextField();
01948             }
01949             gsSelSectorX = min( (reg->RelativeXPos / 13) + 1, 16 );
01950             gsSelSectorY = min( (reg->RelativeYPos / 13) + 1, 16 );
01951             if( gsSelSectorX != sLastX || gsSelSectorY != sLastY )
01952             { //clicked in a new sector
01953                   gfOverrideDirty = TRUE;
01954                   sLastX = gsSelSectorX;
01955                   sLastY = gsSelSectorY;
01956                   iLastClickTime = GetJA2Clock();
01957                   switch( giCurrentViewLevel )
01958                   {
01959                         case ALL_LEVELS_MASK:
01960                               if( gpSectorSummary[ gsSelSectorX - 1 ][ gsSelSectorY - 1 ][ 0 ] )
01961                                     gpCurrentSectorSummary = gpSectorSummary[ gsSelSectorX - 1 ][ gsSelSectorY - 1 ][ 0 ];
01962                               else if( gpSectorSummary[ gsSelSectorX - 1 ][ gsSelSectorY - 1 ][ 1 ] )
01963                                     gpCurrentSectorSummary = gpSectorSummary[ gsSelSectorX - 1 ][ gsSelSectorY - 1 ][ 1 ];
01964                               else if( gpSectorSummary[ gsSelSectorX - 1 ][ gsSelSectorY - 1 ][ 2 ] )
01965                                     gpCurrentSectorSummary = gpSectorSummary[ gsSelSectorX - 1 ][ gsSelSectorY - 1 ][ 2 ];
01966                               else if( gpSectorSummary[ gsSelSectorX - 1 ][ gsSelSectorY - 1 ][ 3 ] )
01967                                     gpCurrentSectorSummary = gpSectorSummary[ gsSelSectorX - 1 ][ gsSelSectorY - 1 ][ 3 ];
01968                               else
01969                                     gpCurrentSectorSummary = NULL;
01970                               break;
01971                         case GROUND_LEVEL_MASK: //already pointing to the correct level
01972                               gpCurrentSectorSummary = gpSectorSummary[ gsSelSectorX - 1 ][ gsSelSectorY - 1 ][ 0 ];
01973                               break;
01974                         case BASEMENT1_LEVEL_MASK:
01975                               gpCurrentSectorSummary = gpSectorSummary[ gsSelSectorX - 1 ][ gsSelSectorY - 1 ][ 1 ];
01976                               break;
01977                         case BASEMENT2_LEVEL_MASK:
01978                               gpCurrentSectorSummary = gpSectorSummary[ gsSelSectorX - 1 ][ gsSelSectorY - 1 ][ 2 ];
01979                               break;
01980                         case BASEMENT3_LEVEL_MASK:
01981                               gpCurrentSectorSummary = gpSectorSummary[ gsSelSectorX - 1 ][ gsSelSectorY - 1 ][ 3 ];
01982                               break;
01983                         case ALTERNATE_LEVELS_MASK:
01984                               if( gpSectorSummary[ gsSelSectorX - 1 ][ gsSelSectorY - 1 ][ 4 ] )
01985                                     gpCurrentSectorSummary = gpSectorSummary[ gsSelSectorX - 1 ][ gsSelSectorY - 1 ][ 4 ];
01986                               else if( gpSectorSummary[ gsSelSectorX - 1 ][ gsSelSectorY - 1 ][ 5 ] )
01987                                     gpCurrentSectorSummary = gpSectorSummary[ gsSelSectorX - 1 ][ gsSelSectorY - 1 ][ 5 ];
01988                               else if( gpSectorSummary[ gsSelSectorX - 1 ][ gsSelSectorY - 1 ][ 6 ] )
01989                                     gpCurrentSectorSummary = gpSectorSummary[ gsSelSectorX - 1 ][ gsSelSectorY - 1 ][ 6 ];
01990                               else if( gpSectorSummary[ gsSelSectorX - 1 ][ gsSelSectorY - 1 ][ 7 ] )
01991                                     gpCurrentSectorSummary = gpSectorSummary[ gsSelSectorX - 1 ][ gsSelSectorY - 1 ][ 7 ];
01992                               else
01993                                     gpCurrentSectorSummary = NULL;
01994                               break;
01995                         case ALTERNATE_GROUND_MASK: //already pointing to the correct level
01996                               gpCurrentSectorSummary = gpSectorSummary[ gsSelSectorX - 1 ][ gsSelSectorY - 1 ][ 4 ];
01997                               break;
01998                         case ALTERNATE_B1_MASK:
01999                               gpCurrentSectorSummary = gpSectorSummary[ gsSelSectorX - 1 ][ gsSelSectorY - 1 ][ 5 ];
02000                               break;
02001                         case ALTERNATE_B2_MASK:
02002                               gpCurrentSectorSummary = gpSectorSummary[ gsSelSectorX - 1 ][ gsSelSectorY - 1 ][ 6 ];
02003                               break;
02004                         case ALTERNATE_B3_MASK:
02005                               gpCurrentSectorSummary = gpSectorSummary[ gsSelSectorX - 1 ][ gsSelSectorY - 1 ][ 7 ];
02006                               break;
02007                   }
02008                   if( gpWorldItemsSummaryArray )
02009                   {
02010                         MemFree( gpWorldItemsSummaryArray );
02011                         gpWorldItemsSummaryArray = NULL;
02012                         gusWorldItemsSummaryArraySize = 0;
02013                   }
02014                   if( gfItemDetailsMode )
02015                   {
02016                         if( gpCurrentSectorSummary )
02017                               /*&& gpCurrentSectorSummary->usNumItems || 
02018                                     gpPEnemyItemsSummaryArray && gusPEnemyItemsSummaryArraySize ||
02019                                     gpNEnemyItemsSummaryArray && gusNEnemyItemsSummaryArraySize )*/
02020                         {
02021                               gfSetupItemDetailsMode = TRUE;
02022                         }
02023                   }
02024             }
02025             else
02026             { //clicked in same sector, check for double click
02027                   INT32 iNewClickTime = GetJA2Clock();
02028                   if( iNewClickTime - iLastClickTime < 400 )
02029                   {
02030                         gfFileIO = TRUE;
02031                   }
02032                   iLastClickTime = iNewClickTime;
02033             }     
02034             gfRenderSummary = TRUE;
02035       }
02036 }
02037 
02038 void SummaryToggleLevelCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
02039 {
02040       INT8 i;
02041       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02042       {
02043             if( GetActiveFieldID() == 1 )
02044                   SelectNextField();
02045             gfRenderSummary = TRUE;
02046             for( i = SUMMARY_ALL; i <= SUMMARY_B3; i++ )
02047             {
02048                   if( btn->IDNum == iSummaryButton[ i ] )
02049                   {
02050                         switch( i )
02051                         {
02052                               case SUMMARY_ALL:
02053                                     giCurrentViewLevel = ALL_LEVELS_MASK;
02054                                     break;
02055                               case SUMMARY_G:
02056                                     giCurrentViewLevel = GROUND_LEVEL_MASK;
02057                                     break;
02058                               case SUMMARY_B1:
02059                                     giCurrentViewLevel = BASEMENT1_LEVEL_MASK;
02060                                     break;
02061                               case SUMMARY_B2:
02062                                     giCurrentViewLevel = BASEMENT2_LEVEL_MASK;
02063                                     break;
02064                               case SUMMARY_B3:
02065                                     giCurrentViewLevel = BASEMENT3_LEVEL_MASK;
02066                                     break;
02067                         }
02068                         if( gfAlternateMaps )
02069                               giCurrentViewLevel <<= 4;
02070                   }
02071                   else
02072                   {
02073                         ButtonList[ iSummaryButton[ i ] ]->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
02074                   }
02075             }
02076       }
02077 }
02078 
02079 void SummaryLoadMapCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
02080 {
02081       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02082       {
02083             UINT16 *ptr;
02084             UINT16 str[ 50 ];
02085             gfRenderSummary = TRUE;
02086             
02087             SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
02088             SetFontForeground( FONT_LTKHAKI );
02089             SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
02090 
02091             //swprintf( str, L"Loading map:  %s...", gszDisplayName );
02092             //mprintf( MAP_LEFT, MAP_BOTTOM+100, str );
02093             //InvalidateRegion( MAP_LEFT, MAP_BOTTOM+100, MAP_LEFT+150, MAP_BOTTOM+110 );
02094             
02095             CreateProgressBar( 0, MAP_LEFT+5, MAP_BOTTOM+110, 573, MAP_BOTTOM+120 );
02096 
02097             DefineProgressBarPanel( 0, 65, 79, 94, MAP_LEFT, 318, 578, 356 );
02098             swprintf( str, L"Loading map:  %s", gszDisplayName );
02099             SetProgressBarTitle( 0, str, BLOCKFONT2, FONT_RED, FONT_NEARBLACK );
02100             SetProgressBarMsgAttributes( 0, SMALLCOMPFONT, FONT_BLACK, FONT_BLACK );
02101 
02102             if(   ExternalLoadMap( gszDisplayName ) )
02103             {
02104                   EnableButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_OKAY ] );
02105                   gsSectorX = gsSelSectorX;
02106                   gsSectorY = gsSelSectorY;
02107                   gfOverrideDirty = TRUE;
02108                   gfMapFileDirty = FALSE;
02109             }
02110             RemoveProgressBar( 0 );
02111             ptr = wcsstr( gszDisplayName, L"_b" );
02112             if( !ptr || ptr[3] != L'.' )
02113             {
02114                   gsSectorLayer = GROUND_LEVEL_MASK;
02115                   giCurrLevel = 0;
02116             }
02117             else
02118             {
02119                   switch( ptr[2] - L'0' )
02120                   {
02121                         case 1:           gsSectorLayer = BASEMENT1_LEVEL_MASK;     break;
02122                         case 2:           gsSectorLayer = BASEMENT2_LEVEL_MASK;     break;
02123                         case 3:           gsSectorLayer = BASEMENT3_LEVEL_MASK;     break;
02124                         default:    gsSectorLayer = GROUND_LEVEL_MASK;        break;
02125                   }
02126             }
02127       }
02128 }
02129 
02130 void SummarySaveMapCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
02131 {
02132       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02133       {
02134             gfRenderSummary = TRUE;
02135             if( gubOverrideStatus == INACTIVE || gfOverride == TRUE )
02136             {
02137                   if( gubOverrideStatus == READONLY )
02138                   {
02139                         UINT8 filename[40];
02140                         sprintf( (char *)filename, "MAPS\\%S", gszDisplayName );
02141                         FileClearAttributes( (STR)filename );
02142                   }     
02143                   if(   ExternalSaveMap( gszDisplayName ) )
02144                   {
02145                         if( gsSelSectorX && gsSelSectorY )
02146                         {
02147                               gsSectorX = gsSelSectorX;
02148                               gsSectorY = gsSelSectorY;
02149                               gfMapFileDirty = FALSE;
02150                               gfOverrideDirty = TRUE;
02151                         }
02152                   }
02153             }
02154       }
02155 }
02156 
02157 void SummaryOverrideCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
02158 {
02159       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02160       {
02161             gfOverride ^= TRUE;
02162             gfRenderSummary = TRUE;
02163             if( gfOverride )
02164                   EnableButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_SAVE ] );
02165             else
02166                   DisableButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_SAVE ] );
02167       }
02168 }
02169 
02170 void CalculateOverrideStatus()
02171 {
02172       GETFILESTRUCT FileInfo;
02173       UINT8 szFilename[40];
02174       gfOverrideDirty = FALSE;
02175       gfOverride = FALSE;
02176       if( gfTempFile )
02177       {
02178             UINT8 *ptr;
02179             sprintf( (char *)szFilename, "MAPS\\%S", gszTempFilename );
02180             if( strlen( szFilename ) == 5 )
02181                   strcat( szFilename, "test.dat" );
02182             ptr = (UINT8 *) strstr( szFilename, "." );
02183             if( !ptr )
02184                   strcat( szFilename, ".dat" );
02185             else
02186                   sprintf( (char *)ptr, ".dat" );
02187       }
02188       else
02189             sprintf( (char *)szFilename, "MAPS\\%S", gszFilename );
02190       swprintf( gszDisplayName, L"%S", &(szFilename[5]) );
02191       if( GetFileFirst( (CHAR8 *)szFilename, &FileInfo) )
02192       {
02193             if( gfWorldLoaded )
02194             {
02195                   if( FileInfo.uiFileAttribs & ( FILE_IS_READONLY | FILE_IS_SYSTEM ) )
02196                         gubOverrideStatus = READONLY;
02197                   else
02198                         gubOverrideStatus = OVERWRITE;
02199                   ShowButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_OVERRIDE ] );
02200                   ButtonList[ iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_OVERRIDE ] ]->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
02201                   GetFileClose(&FileInfo);
02202                   DisableButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_SAVE ] );
02203             }
02204             if( gfTempFile )
02205                   EnableButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_LOAD ] );
02206       }
02207       else
02208       {
02209             gubOverrideStatus = INACTIVE;
02210             HideButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_OVERRIDE ] );
02211             if( gfWorldLoaded )
02212                   EnableButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_SAVE ] );
02213       }
02214 }
02215 
02216 void LoadGlobalSummary()
02217 {
02218       HWFILE      hfile;
02219       STRING512               DataDir;
02220       STRING512               ExecDir;
02221       STRING512               DevInfoDir;
02222       STRING512               MapsDir;
02223       UINT32 uiNumBytesRead;
02224       FLOAT dMajorVersion;
02225   INT32 x,y;
02226       UINT8 szFilename[40];
02227       UINT8 szSector[6];
02228 
02229       OutputDebugString( "Executing LoadGlobalSummary()...\n" );
02230 
02231       // Snap: save current directory
02232       GetFileManCurrentDirectory( DataDir );
02233 
02234       gfMustForceUpdateAllMaps = FALSE;
02235       gusNumberOfMapsToBeForceUpdated = 0;
02236       gfGlobalSummaryExists = FALSE;
02237       //Set current directory to JA2\DevInfo which contains all of the summary data
02238       GetExecutableDirectory( ExecDir );
02239       sprintf( DevInfoDir, "%s\\DevInfo", ExecDir );
02240       sprintf( MapsDir, "%s\\Maps", DataDir );
02241 
02242       //Check to make sure we have a DevInfo directory.  If we don't create one!
02243       if( !SetFileManCurrentDirectory( DevInfoDir ) )
02244       {
02245             OutputDebugString( "LoadGlobalSummary() aborted -- doesn't exist on this local computer.\n");
02246             return;
02247       }
02248 
02249       //TEMP
02250       FileDelete( "_global.sum" );
02251 
02252       gfGlobalSummaryExists = TRUE;
02253       
02254       //Analyse all sectors to see if matching maps exist.  For any maps found, the information
02255       //will be stored in the gbSectorLevels array.  Also, it attempts to load summaries for those
02256       //maps.  If the summary information isn't found, then the occurrences are recorded and reported
02257       //to the user when finished to give the option to generate them.
02258       for( y = 0; y < 16; y++ ) 
02259       {
02260             for( x = 0; x < 16; x++ )
02261             {
02262                   gbSectorLevels[x][y] = 0;
02263                   sprintf( (char *)szSector, "%c%d", 'A' + y, x + 1 );
02264 
02265                   //main ground level
02266                   sprintf( (char *)szFilename, "%c%d.dat", 'A' + y, x + 1 );
02267                   SetFileManCurrentDirectory( MapsDir );
02268                   hfile = FileOpen( (STR)szFilename, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE );
02269                   SetFileManCurrentDirectory( DevInfoDir );
02270                   if( hfile )
02271                   {
02272                         gbSectorLevels[x][y] |= GROUND_LEVEL_MASK;
02273                         FileRead( hfile, &dMajorVersion, sizeof( FLOAT ), &uiNumBytesRead );
02274                         FileClose( hfile );
02275                         LoadSummary( szSector, 0, dMajorVersion );
02276                   }
02277                   else
02278                   {
02279                         sprintf( (char *)szFilename, "%s.sum", szSector );
02280                         FileDelete( (STR)szFilename );
02281                   }
02282                   //main B1 level
02283                   sprintf( (char *)szFilename, "%c%d_b1.dat", 'A' + y, x + 1 );
02284                   SetFileManCurrentDirectory( MapsDir );
02285                   hfile = FileOpen( (STR)szFilename, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE );
02286                   SetFileManCurrentDirectory( DevInfoDir );
02287                   if( hfile )
02288                   {
02289                         gbSectorLevels[x][y] |= BASEMENT1_LEVEL_MASK;
02290                         FileRead( hfile, &dMajorVersion, sizeof( FLOAT ), &uiNumBytesRead );
02291                         FileClose( hfile );
02292                         LoadSummary( szSector, 1, dMajorVersion );
02293                   }
02294                   else
02295                   {
02296                         sprintf( (char *)szFilename, "%s_b1.sum", szSector );
02297                         FileDelete( (STR)szFilename );
02298                   }
02299                   //main B2 level
02300                   sprintf( (char *)szFilename, "%c%d_b2.dat", 'A' + y, x + 1 );
02301                   SetFileManCurrentDirectory( MapsDir );
02302                   hfile = FileOpen( (STR)szFilename, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE );
02303                   SetFileManCurrentDirectory( DevInfoDir );
02304                   if( hfile )
02305                   {
02306                         gbSectorLevels[x][y] |= BASEMENT2_LEVEL_MASK;
02307                         FileRead( hfile, &dMajorVersion, sizeof( FLOAT ), &uiNumBytesRead );
02308                         FileClose( hfile );
02309                         LoadSummary( szSector, 2, dMajorVersion );
02310                   }
02311                   else
02312                   {
02313                         sprintf( (char *)szFilename, "%s_b2.sum", szSector );
02314                         FileDelete( (STR)szFilename );
02315                   }
02316                   //main B3 level
02317                   sprintf( (char *)szFilename, "%c%d_b3.dat", 'A' + y, x + 1 );
02318                   SetFileManCurrentDirectory( MapsDir );
02319                   hfile = FileOpen( (STR)szFilename, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE );
02320                   SetFileManCurrentDirectory( DevInfoDir );
02321                   if( hfile )
02322                   {
02323                         gbSectorLevels[x][y] |= BASEMENT3_LEVEL_MASK;
02324                         FileRead( hfile, &dMajorVersion, sizeof( FLOAT ), &uiNumBytesRead );
02325                         FileClose( hfile );
02326                         LoadSummary( szSector, 3, dMajorVersion );
02327                   }
02328                   else
02329                   {
02330                         sprintf( (char *)szFilename, "%s_b3.sum", szSector );
02331                         FileDelete( (STR)szFilename );
02332                   }
02333                   //alternate ground level
02334                   sprintf( (char *)szFilename, "%c%d_a.dat", 'A' + y, x + 1 );
02335                   SetFileManCurrentDirectory( MapsDir );
02336                   hfile = FileOpen( (STR)szFilename, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE );
02337                   SetFileManCurrentDirectory( DevInfoDir );
02338                   if( hfile )
02339                   {
02340                         gbSectorLevels[x][y] |= ALTERNATE_GROUND_MASK;
02341                         FileRead( hfile, &dMajorVersion, sizeof( FLOAT ), &uiNumBytesRead );
02342                         FileClose( hfile );
02343                         LoadSummary( szSector, 4, dMajorVersion );
02344                   }
02345                   else
02346                   {
02347                         sprintf( (char *)szFilename, "%s_a.sum", szSector );
02348                         FileDelete( (STR)szFilename );
02349                   }
02350                   //alternate B1 level
02351                   sprintf( (char *)szFilename, "%c%d_b1_a.dat", 'A' + y, x + 1 );
02352                   SetFileManCurrentDirectory( MapsDir );
02353                   hfile = FileOpen( (STR)szFilename, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE );
02354                   SetFileManCurrentDirectory( DevInfoDir );
02355                   if( hfile )
02356                   {
02357                         gbSectorLevels[x][y] |= ALTERNATE_B1_MASK;
02358                         FileRead( hfile, &dMajorVersion, sizeof( FLOAT ), &uiNumBytesRead );
02359                         FileClose( hfile );
02360                         LoadSummary( szSector, 5, dMajorVersion );
02361                   }
02362                   else
02363                   {
02364                         sprintf( (char *)szFilename, "%s_b1_a.sum", szSector );
02365                         FileDelete( (STR)szFilename );
02366                   }
02367                   //alternate B2 level
02368                   sprintf( (char *)szFilename, "%c%d_b2_a.dat", 'A' + y, x + 1 );
02369                   SetFileManCurrentDirectory( MapsDir );
02370                   hfile = FileOpen( (STR)szFilename, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE );
02371                   SetFileManCurrentDirectory( DevInfoDir );
02372                   if( hfile )
02373                   {
02374                         gbSectorLevels[x][y] |= ALTERNATE_B2_MASK;
02375                         FileRead( hfile, &dMajorVersion, sizeof( FLOAT ), &uiNumBytesRead );
02376                         FileClose( hfile );
02377                         LoadSummary( szSector, 6, dMajorVersion );
02378                   }
02379                   else
02380                   {
02381                         sprintf( (char *)szFilename, "%s_b2_a.sum", szSector );
02382                         FileDelete( (STR)szFilename );
02383                   }
02384                   //alternate B3 level
02385                   sprintf( (char *)szFilename, "%c%d_b3_a.dat", 'A' + y, x + 1 );
02386                   SetFileManCurrentDirectory( MapsDir );
02387                   hfile = FileOpen( (STR)szFilename, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE );
02388                   SetFileManCurrentDirectory( DevInfoDir );
02389                   if( hfile )
02390                   {
02391                         gbSectorLevels[x][y] |= ALTERNATE_B1_MASK;;
02392                         FileRead( hfile, &dMajorVersion, sizeof( FLOAT ), &uiNumBytesRead );
02393                         FileClose( hfile );
02394                         LoadSummary( szSector, 7, dMajorVersion );
02395                   }
02396                   else
02397                   {
02398                         sprintf( (char *)szFilename, "%s_b3_a.sum", szSector );
02399                         FileDelete( (STR)szFilename );
02400                   }
02401             }
02402             OutputDebugString( (LPCSTR)String("Sector Row %c complete... \n", y + 'A') );
02403       }
02404 
02405       // Snap: Restore the data directory once we are finished.
02406       SetFileManCurrentDirectory( DataDir );
02407 
02408       //sprintf( MapsDir, "%s\\Data", ExecDir );
02409       //SetFileManCurrentDirectory( MapsDir );
02410 
02411       if( gfMustForceUpdateAllMaps )
02412       {
02413             OutputDebugString( (LPCSTR)String( "A MAJOR MAP UPDATE EVENT HAS BEEN DETECTED FOR %d MAPS!!!!.\n", gusNumberOfMapsToBeForceUpdated ) );
02414       }
02415 
02416 
02417       OutputDebugString( "LoadGlobalSummary() finished...\n" );
02418 }
02419 
02420 void GenerateSummaryList()
02421 {
02422       FILE *fp;
02423       STRING512               DataDir;
02424       STRING512               ExecDir;
02425       STRING512               Dir;
02426 
02427       // Snap: save current directory
02428       GetFileManCurrentDirectory( DataDir );
02429 
02430       //Set current directory to JA2\DevInfo which contains all of the summary data
02431       GetExecutableDirectory( ExecDir );
02432       sprintf( Dir, "%s\\DevInfo", ExecDir );
02433       if( !SetFileManCurrentDirectory( Dir ) )
02434       {
02435             //Directory doesn't exist, so create it, and continue.
02436             if( !MakeFileManDirectory( Dir ) )
02437                   AssertMsg( 0, "Can't create new directory, JA2\\DevInfo for summary information." );
02438             if( !SetFileManCurrentDirectory( Dir ) )
02439                   AssertMsg( 0, "Can't set to new directory, JA2\\DevInfo for summary information." );
02440             //Generate a simple readme file.
02441             fp = fopen( "readme.txt", "w" );
02442             Assert( fp );
02443             fprintf( fp, "%s\n%s\n", "This information is used in conjunction with the editor.",
02444                   "This directory or it's contents shouldn't be included with final release." );
02445             fclose( fp );
02446       }
02447       
02448 
02449       // Snap: Restore the data directory once we are finished.
02450       SetFileManCurrentDirectory( DataDir );
02451       //Set current directory back to data directory!
02452       //sprintf( Dir, "%s\\Data", ExecDir );
02453       //SetFileManCurrentDirectory( Dir );
02454 }
02455 
02456 void WriteSectorSummaryUpdate( UINT8 *puiFilename, UINT8 ubLevel, SUMMARYFILE *pSummaryFileInfo )
02457 {
02458       FILE *fp;
02459       STRING512               DataDir;
02460       STRING512               ExecDir;
02461       STRING512               Dir;
02462       UINT8                         *ptr;
02463       INT8 x, y;
02464       
02465       // Snap: save current directory
02466       GetFileManCurrentDirectory( DataDir );
02467 
02468       //Set current directory to JA2\DevInfo which contains all of the summary data
02469       GetExecutableDirectory( ExecDir );
02470       sprintf( Dir, "%s\\DevInfo", ExecDir );
02471       if( !SetFileManCurrentDirectory( Dir ) )
02472             AssertMsg( 0, "JA2\\DevInfo folder not found and should exist!");
02473 
02474       ptr = (UINT8 *) strstr( puiFilename, ".dat" );
02475       if( !ptr )
02476             AssertMsg( 0, "Illegal sector summary filename.");
02477       sprintf( (char *)ptr, ".sum" );
02478 
02479       //write the summary information
02480       fp = fopen( (const char *)puiFilename, "wb" );
02481       Assert( fp );
02482       fwrite( pSummaryFileInfo, 1, sizeof( SUMMARYFILE ), fp );
02483       fclose( fp );
02484 
02485       gusNumEntriesWithOutdatedOrNoSummaryInfo--;
02486       UpdateMasterProgress();
02487 
02488       //extract the sector information out of the filename.
02489       if( puiFilename[0] >= 'a' )
02490             y = puiFilename[0] - 'a';
02491       else
02492             y = puiFilename[0] - 'A';
02493       if( puiFilename[2] < '0' || puiFilename[2] > '9' )
02494             x = puiFilename[ 1 ] - '0' - 1;
02495       else
02496             x = (puiFilename[ 1 ] - '0') * 10 + puiFilename[ 2 ] - '0' - 1;
02497 
02498       gpSectorSummary[x][y][ubLevel] = pSummaryFileInfo;
02499 
02500       // Snap: Restore the data directory once we are finished.
02501       SetFileManCurrentDirectory( DataDir );
02502       //Set current directory back to data directory!
02503       //sprintf( Dir, "%s\\Data", ExecDir );
02504       //SetFileManCurrentDirectory( Dir );
02505 }

02539 
02540 void LoadSummary( UINT8 *pSector, UINT8 ubLevel, FLOAT dMajorMapVersion )
02541 {
02542       UINT8 filename[40];
02543       SUMMARYFILE temp;
02544       INT32 x, y;
02545       FILE *fp;
02546       sprintf( (char *)filename, (const char *)pSector );
02547       if( ubLevel % 4 )
02548       {
02549             UINT8 str[4];
02550             sprintf( (char *)str, "_b%d", ubLevel % 4 );
02551             strcat( filename, str );
02552       }
02553       if( ubLevel >= 4 )
02554       {
02555             strcat( filename, "_a" );
02556       }
02557       strcat( filename, ".sum" );
02558 
02559       fp = fopen( (const char *)filename, "rb" );
02560       if( !fp )
02561       {
02562             gusNumEntriesWithOutdatedOrNoSummaryInfo++;
02563             return;
02564       }
02565       fread( &temp, 1, sizeof( SUMMARYFILE ), fp );
02566       if( temp.ubSummaryVersion < MINIMUMVERSION || dMajorMapVersion < gdMajorMapVersion )
02567       {
02568             gusNumberOfMapsToBeForceUpdated++;
02569             gfMustForceUpdateAllMaps = TRUE;
02570       }
02571       temp.dMajorMapVersion = dMajorMapVersion;
02572       UpdateSummaryInfo( &temp );
02573       //even if the info is outdated (but existing), allocate the structure, but indicate that the info
02574       //is bad.
02575       y = pSector[0] - 'A';
02576       if( pSector[2] >= '0' && pSector[2] <= '9' )
02577             x = (pSector[1] - '0') * 10 + pSector[2] - '0' - 1;
02578       else
02579             x = pSector[1] - '0' - 1;
02580       if( gpSectorSummary[x][y][ubLevel] )
02581       {
02582             MemFree( gpSectorSummary[x][y][ubLevel] );
02583             gpSectorSummary[x][y][ubLevel] = NULL;
02584       }
02585       gpSectorSummary[x][y][ubLevel] = (SUMMARYFILE*)MemAlloc( sizeof( SUMMARYFILE ) );   
02586       if( gpSectorSummary[x][y][ubLevel] )
02587             memcpy( gpSectorSummary[x][y][ubLevel], &temp, sizeof( SUMMARYFILE ) );
02588       if( gpSectorSummary[x][y][ubLevel]->ubSummaryVersion < GLOBAL_SUMMARY_VERSION )
02589             gusNumEntriesWithOutdatedOrNoSummaryInfo++;
02590       
02591       fclose( fp );
02592 }
02593 
02594 
02595 double MasterStart, MasterEnd;
02596 
02597 void UpdateMasterProgress()
02598 {
02599       if( gfUpdatingNow && gusTotal )
02600       {
02601             MasterStart = (gusCurrent / (double)gusTotal) * 100.0;
02602             gusCurrent++;
02603             MasterEnd = (gusCurrent / (double)gusTotal) * 100.0;
02604             if( gfMajorUpdate )
02605             {
02606                   SetRelativeStartAndEndPercentage( 2, (UINT16)MasterStart, (UINT16)MasterEnd, NULL );
02607                   RenderProgressBar( 2, 0 );
02608             }
02609             else
02610                   SetRelativeStartAndEndPercentage( 1, (UINT16)MasterStart, (UINT16)MasterEnd, NULL );
02611       }
02612 }
02613 
02614 void ReportError( UINT8 *pSector, UINT8 ubLevel )
02615 {
02616       static INT32 yp = 180;
02617       UINT16 str[40];
02618       UINT16 temp[10];
02619 
02620       //Make sure the file exists... if not, then return false
02621       swprintf( str, L"%S", pSector );
02622       if( ubLevel % 4  )
02623       {
02624             swprintf( temp, L"_b%d.dat", ubLevel % 4 );
02625             wcscat( str, temp );
02626       }
02627       mprintf( 10, yp, L"Skipping update for %s.  Probably due to tileset conflicts...", str );
02628       InvalidateScreen();
02629       yp++;
02630 }
02631 
02632 
02633 void RegenerateSummaryInfoForAllOutdatedMaps()
02634 {
02635       INT32 x, y;
02636       UINT8 str[40];
02637       SUMMARYFILE *pSF;
02638       //CreateProgressBar( 0, 20, 120, 300, 132 ); //slave (individual)
02639       //CreateProgressBar( 1, 20, 100, 300, 112 ); //master (total)
02640       //DefineProgressBarPanel( 0, 65, 79, 94, 10, 80, 310, 152 );
02641       CreateProgressBar( 0, 20, 100, 300, 112 ); //master (total)
02642       DefineProgressBarPanel( 0, 65, 79, 94, 10, 80, 310, 132 );
02643       SetProgressBarTitle( 0, L"Generating map information", BLOCKFONT2, FONT_RED, FONT_NEARBLACK );
02644       SetProgressBarMsgAttributes( 0, SMALLCOMPFONT, FONT_BLACK, FONT_BLACK );
02645       gfUpdatingNow = TRUE;
02646 
02647       gusCurrent = 0;
02648       gusTotal = gusNumEntriesWithOutdatedOrNoSummaryInfo;
02649       UpdateMasterProgress();
02650 
02651       for( y = 0; y < 16; y++ ) for( x = 0; x < 16; x++ )
02652       {
02653             sprintf( (char *)str, "%c%d", y + 'A', x + 1 );
02654             if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & GROUND_LEVEL_MASK )
02655             {
02656                   pSF = gpSectorSummary[x][y][0];
02657                   if( !pSF || pSF->ubSummaryVersion != GLOBAL_SUMMARY_VERSION )
02658                         if( !EvaluateWorld( str, 0 ) )
02659                               ReportError( str, 0 );
02660             }
02661             if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & BASEMENT1_LEVEL_MASK )
02662             {
02663                   pSF = gpSectorSummary[x][y][1];
02664                   if( !pSF || pSF->ubSummaryVersion != GLOBAL_SUMMARY_VERSION )
02665                         if( !EvaluateWorld( str, 1 ) )
02666                               ReportError( str, 1 );
02667             }
02668             if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & BASEMENT2_LEVEL_MASK )
02669             {
02670                   pSF = gpSectorSummary[x][y][2];
02671                   if( !pSF || pSF->ubSummaryVersion != GLOBAL_SUMMARY_VERSION )
02672                         if( !EvaluateWorld( str, 2 ) )
02673                               ReportError( str, 2 );
02674             }
02675             if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & BASEMENT3_LEVEL_MASK )
02676             {
02677                   pSF = gpSectorSummary[x][y][3];
02678                   if( !pSF || pSF->ubSummaryVersion != GLOBAL_SUMMARY_VERSION )
02679                         if( !EvaluateWorld( str, 3 ) )
02680                               ReportError( str, 3 );
02681             }
02682             if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & ALTERNATE_GROUND_MASK )
02683             {
02684                   pSF = gpSectorSummary[x][y][4];
02685                   if( !pSF || pSF->ubSummaryVersion != GLOBAL_SUMMARY_VERSION )
02686                         if( !EvaluateWorld( str, 4 ) )
02687                               ReportError( str, 4 );
02688             }
02689             if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & ALTERNATE_B1_MASK )
02690             {
02691                   pSF = gpSectorSummary[x][y][5];
02692                   if( !pSF || pSF->ubSummaryVersion != GLOBAL_SUMMARY_VERSION )
02693                         if( !EvaluateWorld( str, 5 ) )
02694                               ReportError( str, 5 );
02695             }
02696             if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & ALTERNATE_B2_MASK )
02697             {
02698                   pSF = gpSectorSummary[x][y][6];
02699                   if( !pSF || pSF->ubSummaryVersion != GLOBAL_SUMMARY_VERSION )
02700                         if( !EvaluateWorld( str, 6 ) )
02701                               ReportError( str, 6 );
02702             }
02703             if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & ALTERNATE_B3_MASK )
02704             {
02705                   pSF = gpSectorSummary[x][y][7];
02706                   if( !pSF || pSF->ubSummaryVersion != GLOBAL_SUMMARY_VERSION )
02707                         if( !EvaluateWorld( str, 7 ) )
02708                               ReportError( str, 7 );
02709             }
02710       }
02711       RemoveProgressBar( 0 );
02712       RemoveProgressBar( 1 );
02713       gfUpdatingNow = FALSE;
02714 }
02715 
02716 void SummaryUpdateCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
02717 {
02718       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02719       {
02720             UINT8 str[40];
02721             CreateProgressBar( 0, 20, 100, 300, 112 ); //slave (individual)
02722             DefineProgressBarPanel( 0, 65, 79, 94, 10, 80, 310, 132 );
02723             SetProgressBarTitle( 0, L"Generating map summary", BLOCKFONT2, FONT_RED, FONT_NEARBLACK );
02724             SetProgressBarMsgAttributes( 0, SMALLCOMPFONT, FONT_BLACK, FONT_BLACK );
02725 
02726             if( gpCurrentSectorSummary )
02727             {
02728                   MemFree( gpCurrentSectorSummary );
02729                   gpCurrentSectorSummary = NULL;
02730             }
02731 
02732             sprintf( (char *)str, "%c%d", gsSelSectorY + 'A' - 1, gsSelSectorX );
02733             EvaluateWorld( str, (UINT8)giCurrLevel );
02734 
02735             gpSectorSummary[ gsSelSectorX ][ gsSelSectorY ][ giCurrLevel ] = gpCurrentSectorSummary;
02736             
02737             gfRenderSummary = TRUE;
02738 
02739             RemoveProgressBar( 0 );
02740       }
02741 }
02742 
02743 void ExtractTempFilename()
02744 {
02745       UINT16 str[40];
02746       Get16BitStringFromField( 1, str );
02747       if( wcscmp( gszTempFilename, str ) )
02748       {
02749             wcscpy( gszTempFilename, str );
02750             gfRenderSummary = TRUE;
02751             gfOverrideDirty = TRUE;
02752       }
02753       if( !wcslen( str ) )
02754             swprintf( gszDisplayName, L"test.dat" );
02755 }

02757 void ApologizeOverrideAndForceUpdateEverything()
02758 {
02759       INT32 x, y;
02760       UINT16 str[ 50 ];
02761       UINT8 name[50];
02762       SUMMARYFILE *pSF;
02763       //Create one huge assed button
02764       gfMajorUpdate = TRUE;
02765       iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_BACKGROUND ] = 
02766             CreateTextButton( 0, 0, 0, 0, BUTTON_USE_DEFAULT, 0, 0, 640, 480, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH - 1, 
02767             BUTTON_NO_CALLBACK, BUTTON_NO_CALLBACK );
02768       SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_BACKGROUND ], DISABLED_STYLE_NONE );
02769       DisableButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_BACKGROUND ] );
02770       //Draw it
02771       DrawButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_BACKGROUND ] );
02772       InvalidateRegion( 0, 0, 640, 480 );
02773       SetFont( HUGEFONT );
02774       SetFontForeground( FONT_RED );
02775       SetFontShadow( FONT_NEARBLACK );
02776       swprintf( str, L"MAJOR VERSION UPDATE" );
02777       mprintf( 320 - StringPixLength( str, HUGEFONT )/2, 105, str );
02778       SetFont( FONT10ARIAL );
02779       SetFontForeground( FONT_YELLOW );
02780       swprintf( str, L"There are %d maps requiring a major version update.", gusNumberOfMapsToBeForceUpdated );
02781       mprintf( 320 - StringPixLength( str, FONT10ARIAL )/2, 130, str );
02782 
02783       CreateProgressBar( 2, 120, 170, 520, 202 ); 
02784       DefineProgressBarPanel( 2, 65, 79, 94, 100, 150, 540, 222 );
02785       SetProgressBarTitle( 2, L"Updating all outdated maps", BLOCKFONT2, FONT_RED, 0 );
02786       SetProgressBarMsgAttributes( 2, SMALLCOMPFONT, FONT_BLACK, FONT_BLACK );
02787 
02788       gusCurrent = 0;
02789       gusTotal = gusNumberOfMapsToBeForceUpdated;
02790       gfUpdatingNow = TRUE;
02791       UpdateMasterProgress();
02792 
02793       for( y = 0; y < 16; y++ ) for( x = 0; x < 16; x++ )
02794       {
02795             sprintf( (char *)name, "%c%d", y + 'A', x + 1 );
02796             if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & GROUND_LEVEL_MASK )
02797             {
02798                   pSF = gpSectorSummary[x][y][0];
02799                   if( !pSF || pSF->ubSummaryVersion < MINIMUMVERSION || pSF->dMajorMapVersion < gdMajorMapVersion )
02800                   {
02801                         gpCurrentSectorSummary = pSF;
02802                         if( !EvaluateWorld( name, 0 ) )
02803                               return;
02804                   }
02805             }
02806             if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & BASEMENT1_LEVEL_MASK )
02807             {
02808                   pSF = gpSectorSummary[x][y][1];
02809                   if( !pSF || pSF->ubSummaryVersion < MINIMUMVERSION || pSF->dMajorMapVersion < gdMajorMapVersion )
02810                   {
02811                         gpCurrentSectorSummary = pSF;
02812                         if( !EvaluateWorld( name, 1 ) )
02813                               return;
02814                   }
02815             }
02816             if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & BASEMENT2_LEVEL_MASK )
02817             {
02818                   pSF = gpSectorSummary[x][y][2];
02819                   if( !pSF || pSF->ubSummaryVersion < MINIMUMVERSION || pSF->dMajorMapVersion < gdMajorMapVersion )
02820                   {
02821                         gpCurrentSectorSummary = pSF;
02822                         if( !EvaluateWorld( name, 2 ) )
02823                               return;
02824                   }
02825             }
02826             if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & BASEMENT3_LEVEL_MASK )
02827             {
02828                   pSF = gpSectorSummary[x][y][3];
02829                   if( !pSF || pSF->ubSummaryVersion < MINIMUMVERSION || pSF->dMajorMapVersion < gdMajorMapVersion )
02830                   {
02831                         gpCurrentSectorSummary = pSF;
02832                         if( !EvaluateWorld( name, 3 ) )
02833                               return;
02834                   }
02835             }
02836             if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & ALTERNATE_GROUND_MASK )
02837             {
02838                   pSF = gpSectorSummary[x][y][4];
02839                   if( !pSF || pSF->ubSummaryVersion < MINIMUMVERSION || pSF->dMajorMapVersion < gdMajorMapVersion )
02840                   {
02841                         gpCurrentSectorSummary = pSF;
02842                         if( !EvaluateWorld( name, 4 ) )
02843                               return;
02844                   }
02845             }
02846             if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & ALTERNATE_B1_MASK )
02847             {
02848                   pSF = gpSectorSummary[x][y][5];
02849                   if( !pSF || pSF->ubSummaryVersion < MINIMUMVERSION || pSF->dMajorMapVersion < gdMajorMapVersion )
02850                   {
02851                         gpCurrentSectorSummary = pSF;
02852                         if( !EvaluateWorld( name, 5 ) )
02853                               return;
02854                   }
02855             }
02856             if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & ALTERNATE_B2_MASK )
02857             {
02858                   pSF = gpSectorSummary[x][y][6];
02859                   if( !pSF || pSF->ubSummaryVersion < MINIMUMVERSION || pSF->dMajorMapVersion < gdMajorMapVersion )
02860                   {
02861                         gpCurrentSectorSummary = pSF;
02862                         if( !EvaluateWorld( name, 6 ) )
02863                               return;
02864                   }
02865             }
02866             if( gbSectorLevels[x][y] & ALTERNATE_B3_MASK )
02867             {
02868                   pSF = gpSectorSummary[x][y][7];
02869                   if( !pSF || pSF->ubSummaryVersion < MINIMUMVERSION || pSF->dMajorMapVersion < gdMajorMapVersion )
02870                   {
02871                         gpCurrentSectorSummary = pSF;
02872                         if( !EvaluateWorld( name, 7 ) )
02873                               return;
02874                   }
02875             }
02876       }
02877 
02878       EvaluateWorld( (UINT8 *)"p3_m.dat", 0 );
02879 
02880       RemoveProgressBar( 2 );
02881       gfUpdatingNow = FALSE;
02882       InvalidateScreen();
02883 
02884       RemoveButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_BACKGROUND ] );
02885       gfMajorUpdate = FALSE;
02886       gfMustForceUpdateAllMaps = FALSE;
02887       gusNumberOfMapsToBeForceUpdated = 0;

02889 
02890 void SetupItemDetailsMode( BOOLEAN fAllowRecursion )
02891 {
02892       HWFILE hfile;
02893       UINT32 uiNumBytesRead;
02894       UINT32 uiNumItems;
02895       UINT8 szFilename[40];
02896       BASIC_SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT basic;
02897       SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT priority;
02898       INT32 i, j;
02899       UINT16 usNumItems;
02900       OBJECTTYPE *pItem;
02901       UINT16 usPEnemyIndex, usNEnemyIndex;
02902 
02903       //Clear memory for all the item summaries loaded
02904       if( gpWorldItemsSummaryArray )
02905       {
02906             MemFree( gpWorldItemsSummaryArray );
02907             gpWorldItemsSummaryArray = NULL;
02908             gusWorldItemsSummaryArraySize = 0;
02909       }
02910       if( gpPEnemyItemsSummaryArray )
02911       {
02912             MemFree( gpPEnemyItemsSummaryArray );
02913             gpPEnemyItemsSummaryArray = NULL;
02914             gusPEnemyItemsSummaryArraySize = 0;
02915       }
02916       if( gpNEnemyItemsSummaryArray )
02917       {
02918             MemFree( gpNEnemyItemsSummaryArray );
02919             gpNEnemyItemsSummaryArray = NULL;
02920             gusNEnemyItemsSummaryArraySize = 0;
02921       }
02922 
02923       if( !gpCurrentSectorSummary->uiNumItemsPosition )
02924       {     //Don't have one, so generate them
02925             if( gpCurrentSectorSummary->ubSummaryVersion == GLOBAL_SUMMARY_VERSION )
02926                   gusNumEntriesWithOutdatedOrNoSummaryInfo++;
02927             SummaryUpdateCallback( ButtonList[ iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_UPDATE ] ], MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP );
02928             gpCurrentSectorSummary = gpSectorSummary[ gsSelSectorX - 1 ][ gsSelSectorY - 1 ][ giCurrLevel ];
02929       }
02930       //Open the original map for the sector
02931       sprintf( (char *)szFilename, "MAPS\\%S", gszFilename );
02932       hfile = FileOpen( (STR)szFilename, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE );
02933       if( !hfile )
02934       { //The file couldn't be found!
02935             return;
02936       }
02937       //Now fileseek directly to the file position where the number of world items are stored
02938       if( !FileSeek( hfile, gpCurrentSectorSummary->uiNumItemsPosition, FILE_SEEK_FROM_START ) )
02939       { //Position couldn't be found!
02940             FileClose( hfile );
02941             return;
02942       }
02943       //Now load the number of world items from the map.
02944       FileRead( hfile, &uiNumItems, 4, &uiNumBytesRead );
02945       if( uiNumBytesRead != 4 )
02946       { //Invalid situation.
02947             FileClose( hfile );
02948             return;
02949       }
02950       //Now compare this number with the number the summary thinks we should have.  If they are different,
02951       //the the summary doesn't match the map.  What we will do is force regenerate the map so that they do
02952       //match
02953       if( uiNumItems != gpCurrentSectorSummary->usNumItems && fAllowRecursion )
02954       {
02955             FileClose( hfile );
02956             gpCurrentSectorSummary->uiNumItemsPosition = 0;
02957             SetupItemDetailsMode( FALSE );
02958             return;
02959       }
02960       //Passed the gauntlet, so now allocate memory for it, and load all the world items into this array.
02961       ShowButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_SCIFI ] );
02962       ShowButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_REAL ] );
02963       ShowButton( iSummaryButton[ SUMMARY_ENEMY ] );
02964       gpWorldItemsSummaryArray = (WORLDITEM*)MemAlloc( sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * uiNumItems );
02965       gusWorldItemsSummaryArraySize = gpCurrentSectorSummary->usNumItems;
02966       FileRead( hfile, gpWorldItemsSummaryArray, sizeof( WORLDITEM ) * uiNumItems, &uiNumBytesRead );
02967 
02968       //NOW, do the enemy's items!
02969       //We need to do two passes.  The first pass simply processes all the enemies and counts all the droppable items
02970       //keeping track of two different values.  The first value is the number of droppable items that come off of
02971       //enemy detailed placements, the other counter keeps track of the number of droppable items that come off of 
02972       //normal enemy placements.  After doing this, the memory is allocated for the tables that will store all the item
02973       //summary information, then the second pass will repeat the process, except it will record the actual items.
02974 
02975       //PASS #1
02976       if( !FileSeek( hfile, gpCurrentSectorSummary->uiEnemyPlacementPosition, FILE_SEEK_FROM_START ) )
02977       { //Position couldn't be found!
02978             FileClose( hfile );
02979             return;
02980       }
02981       for( i = 0; i < gpCurrentSectorSummary->MapInfo.ubNumIndividuals ; i++ )
02982       {
02983             FileRead( hfile, &basic, sizeof( BASIC_SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT ), &uiNumBytesRead );
02984             if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( BASIC_SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT ) )
02985             { //Invalid situation.
02986                   FileClose( hfile );
02987                   return;
02988             }
02989             if( basic.fDetailedPlacement )
02990             { //skip static priority placement 
02991                   FileRead( hfile, &priority, sizeof( SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT ), &uiNumBytesRead );
02992                   if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT ) )
02993                   { //Invalid situation.
02994                         FileClose( hfile );
02995                         return;
02996                   }
02997             }
02998             else
02999             { //non detailed placements don't have items, so skip
03000                   continue;
03001             }
03002             if( basic.bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM )
03003             {
03004                   //Count the items that this enemy placement drops
03005                   usNumItems = 0;
03006                   for( j = 0; j < 9; j++ )
03007                   {
03008                         pItem = &priority.Inv[ gbMercSlotTypes[ j ] ];
03009                         if( pItem->usItem != NOTHING && !( pItem->fFlags & OBJECT_UNDROPPABLE ) )
03010                         {
03011                               usNumItems++;
03012                         }
03013                   }
03014                   if( basic.fPriorityExistance )
03015                   {
03016                         gusPEnemyItemsSummaryArraySize += usNumItems;
03017                   }
03018                   else
03019                   {
03020                         gusNEnemyItemsSummaryArraySize += usNumItems;
03021                   }
03022             }
03023       }
03024 
03025       //Pass 1 completed, so now allocate enough space to hold all the items
03026       if( gusPEnemyItemsSummaryArraySize )
03027       {
03028             gpPEnemyItemsSummaryArray = (OBJECTTYPE*)MemAlloc( sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) * gusPEnemyItemsSummaryArraySize );
03029             memset( gpPEnemyItemsSummaryArray, 0, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) * gusPEnemyItemsSummaryArraySize );
03030       }
03031       if( gusNEnemyItemsSummaryArraySize )
03032       {
03033             gpNEnemyItemsSummaryArray = (OBJECTTYPE*)MemAlloc( sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) * gusNEnemyItemsSummaryArraySize );
03034             memset( gpNEnemyItemsSummaryArray, 0, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) * gusNEnemyItemsSummaryArraySize );
03035       }
03036 
03037       //PASS #2
03038       //During this pass, simply copy all the data instead of counting it, now that we have already done so.
03039       usPEnemyIndex = usNEnemyIndex = 0;
03040       if( !FileSeek( hfile, gpCurrentSectorSummary->uiEnemyPlacementPosition, FILE_SEEK_FROM_START ) )
03041       { //Position couldn't be found!
03042             FileClose( hfile );
03043             return;
03044       }
03045       for( i = 0; i < gpCurrentSectorSummary->MapInfo.ubNumIndividuals ; i++ )
03046       {
03047             FileRead( hfile, &basic, sizeof( BASIC_SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT ), &uiNumBytesRead );
03048             if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( BASIC_SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT ) )
03049             { //Invalid situation.
03050                   FileClose( hfile );
03051                   return;
03052             }
03053             if( basic.fDetailedPlacement )
03054             { //skip static priority placement 
03055                   FileRead( hfile, &priority, sizeof( SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT ), &uiNumBytesRead );
03056                   if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( SOLDIERCREATE_STRUCT ) )
03057                   { //Invalid situation.
03058                         FileClose( hfile );
03059                         return;
03060                   }
03061             }
03062             else
03063             { //non detailed placements don't have items, so skip
03064                   continue;
03065             }
03066             if( basic.bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM )
03067             {
03068                   //Copy the items that this enemy placement drops
03069                   usNumItems = 0;
03070                   for( j = 0; j < 9; j++ )
03071                   {
03072                         pItem = &priority.Inv[ gbMercSlotTypes[ j ] ];
03073                         if( pItem->usItem != NOTHING && !( pItem->fFlags & OBJECT_UNDROPPABLE ) )
03074                         {
03075                               if( basic.fPriorityExistance )
03076                               {
03077                                     memcpy( &(gpPEnemyItemsSummaryArray[ usPEnemyIndex ]), pItem, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
03078                                     usPEnemyIndex++;
03079                               }
03080                               else
03081                               {
03082                                     memcpy( &(gpNEnemyItemsSummaryArray[ usNEnemyIndex ]), pItem, sizeof( OBJECTTYPE ) );
03083                                     usNEnemyIndex++;
03084                               }
03085                         }
03086                   }
03087             }
03088       }
03089       FileClose( hfile );
03090 }
03091 
03092 UINT8 GetCurrentSummaryVersion()
03093 {
03094       if( gpCurrentSectorSummary )
03095       {
03096             return gpCurrentSectorSummary->MapInfo.ubMapVersion;
03097       }
03098       return 0;
03099 }
